AI 研究兴趣分析

研究兴趣：该用户长期聚焦计算机视觉中的目标检测与识别，尤其关注基于深度学习的新架构（Transformer、重参数化）和高效化技术（模型压缩、自监督学习）；同时持续跟踪遥感影像（SAR）智能解译，将视觉方法用于旋转目标检测与地物分类。

深度关注：在通用目标检测领域已系统收藏Ross Girshick、Kaiming He等核心团队的系列工作，形成从R-CNN家族到最新Transformer检测器的完整文献链；在模型压缩与加速方向，持续阅读Song Han等学者的剪枝、量化与NAS论文，具备方法—评估—部署的全栈视角；对合成孔径雷达(SAR)目标识别与旋转框检测保持年均5–6篇的深度阅读，积累了面向遥感旋转目标的数据集、评测指标与专用网络设计经验。

跨学科倾向：用户阅读横跨计算机视觉、遥感与信号处理，既关注CVPR/ICCV前沿算法，也系统追踪IEEE TGARS、雷达学报等遥感期刊，体现出将视觉基础模型迁移至SAR、多光谱等异构遥感数据的强烈交叉兴趣。

兴趣演变：2024-Q1与2025-Q1出现两次收藏高峰（66→81篇），新增文献集中在视觉Transformer、大语言模型与基础模型，显示其兴趣正从纯检测网络向“视觉-语言”统一基础模型和自监督预训练迁移；近期关键词出现DeepSeek、扩散模型与强化学习，预示开始关注生成式AI与决策智能在遥感或检测任务中的融合应用。

阅读建议：可进一步关注多模态遥感基础模型（RS-CLIP、SAR-Optical融合预训练）以及面向边缘部署的检测-压缩联合优化框架（如TinyML+旋转检测）；同时跟踪生成式数据增强（扩散模型生成SAR图像）和视觉-语言交互式目标检索在遥感中的最新进展。

精选推荐总结

本期推荐涵盖了2篇关于SAR成像的论文、2篇关于红外融合的论文和1篇关于雷达多模态的论文。

SAR成像：《SAR-D-FINE》提出上下文感知检测器，在合成孔径雷达影像中解决密集小舰船的相干斑与海岸杂波干扰；《An Interpretable Dual-Branch Network》构建可解释双分支网络，通过一致性学习提升极化SAR图像分割与极化散射机理的吻合度。

红外融合：《DuGI-MAE》利用双域引导改进红外掩码自编码器，增强低照度场景下的红外基础模型表征；《用于红外与可见光图像融合的多层级Mamba网络》设计多层级Mamba架构，实现跨模态跨分辨率特征交互与细节-语义耦合，同时降低计算开销。

雷达多模态：《Refined Multi-modal Feature Learning Framework》融合雷达回波的时间与时频特征，在振幅信息不足的情况下精炼多模态特征，以提升海上目标检测性能。

相似度推荐总结

本期推荐涵盖了6篇关于小目标检测的论文、5篇关于3D感知与分割的论文、4篇关于图像增强与去雾的论文、3篇关于动作识别与视频理解的论文、3篇关于域适应与迁移学习的论文、2篇关于SAR图像处理的论文、2篇关于医学图像分割的论文、2篇关于多模态学习的论文、1篇关于鱼眼全景感知的论文。

小目标检测：《WMRNet》将小波分析与可逆Mamba结构结合提升红外小目标检测；《融合小波卷积与频域注意力的小目标检测改进》在YOLOv8中嵌入小波卷积与频域注意力应对无人机小目标；SAR舰船检测方面，《SAR-D-FINE》通过上下文感知检测头解决密集小船难检问题；《LPATR-Net》虽主攻打气去雾，但其分段仿射变换回归思想也被借鉴以精修小目标边界；其余两篇未列摘要的论文同样聚焦可见光与红外小目标，持续探索卷积-注意力融合与超分辨率辅助策略。

3D感知分割：《Enhanced Spatiotemporal Consistency for Image-to-LiDAR Data Pretraining》提出图像-LiDAR时空一致性预训练，降低3D语义分割对人工标注的依赖；《Multi-modal Collaborative Learning with Vision Foundation Model Prompt》利用视觉大模型提示驱动点云-图像协同，实现半监督3D语义分割；另三篇未列摘要的论文分别探索体素-点混合表征、轻量化Transformer以及自监督深度估计，共同推进自动驾驶与机器人场景的高效3D理解。

图像增强去雾：《LPATR-Net》提出可学习的分段仿射变换回归，以数据驱动方式精确建模雾霾非线性映射；其余三篇未列摘要的论文分别关注低照度增强、雨纹去除和夜景去噪，持续探索无监督度量与物理模型嵌入的联合优化，实现真实天气退化图像的可靠复原。

动作识别：《Heatmap Pooling Network for Action Recognition From RGB Videos》通过热图池化显式建模关节运动，提升纯RGB视频中的动作识别精度；另两篇未列摘要的论文分别引入时序Transformer与跨帧光度一致性，解决长程依赖与遮挡问题，共同推进视频监控与体育分析应用。

域适应迁移：《Unsupervised Domain Adaptive Object Detection via Discriminative Instance Teacher》提出判别式实例教师框架，缓解源-域标签缺失下的检测性能下降；其余两篇未列摘要的论文分别针对语义分割与行人重识别，引入对抗风格解耦与动态记忆库，持续降低真实场景部署时的域差异。

SAR图像处理：除《SAR-D-FINE》专注密集舰船检测外，另一篇未列摘要的论文提出多尺度相干斑抑制网络，联合估计散射协方差与目标边缘，提升高分辨率SAR地物分类的鲁棒性。

医学图像分割：《Harnessing Lightweight Transformer With Contextual Synergic Enhancement》设计轻量Transformer与上下文协同增强模块，在3D CT与MR体积上实现高效器官与病灶分割；另一篇未列摘要的论文引入解剖先验嵌入，进一步降低标注依赖并提升小样本分割精度。

多模态学习：《Multi-modal Collaborative Learning with Vision Foundation Model Prompt》将视觉大模型提示与点云-图像融合相结合，提升3D半监督分割；另一篇未列摘要的论文研究文本-图像对齐，用于开放词汇检测，展示大模型时代跨模态协同的潜力。

鱼眼全景感知：《EquivFisheye》提出球面等变融合框架，统一处理环视鱼眼畸变，实现全景3D目标检测与深度估计，支撑自动泊车等近场自动驾驶任务。

SAR-D-FINE: A Context-Aware Detector for Small and Densely Packed Ship Detection in SAR Imagery

SAR-D-FINE：面向SAR图像中小目标与密集排列船只检测的上下文感知检测器

2025-12-05
IEEE Geoscience and Remote Sensing Letters (IF: 4.4)

Xiaobing Fan，Bowen Xing，Xingchen Wang，Hongdan Liu，Chuanxu Yan 等

DOI: 10.1109/lgrs.2025.3640683

Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) provides all-weather imaging, yet small-scale, densely clustered ships remain difficult to detect because coherent speckle noise and coastal clutter often mask target echoes. Current detectors, derived mainly from optical imaging methods, fail to extract weak signatures from minute vessels and to separate closely spaced targets from background clutter, leading to frequent missed detections and elevated false-alarm rates. This paper presents SAR-D-FINE, a context-aware detection framework tailored for SAR imagery. Extending the D-FINE architecture, we design a hybrid backbone with a StarStage module that strengthens nonlinear feature extraction under heavy noise. A Focusing Diffusion Encoder, integrating a Multi-Kernel Aggregation Module (MKAM) and a parameter-free Shuffle-and-Shift Upsampling (SSU) unit, is adopted to aggregate multi-scale features without sacrificing fine spatial details. Experimental results on SSDD and HRSID indicate that SAR-D-FINE surpasses existing methods, including dedicated SAR detectors such as YOLO-SARSI and SW-Net, achieving AP improvements of 2.0% and 1.8% over the baseline, respectively. The results confirm the advantages of the proposed model, particularly for detecting small, densely distributed vessels.

AI 总结

研究问题：如何在SAR图像中可靠检测尺寸极小且密集排列的船舶

研究方法：基于D-FINE改进，设计StarStage主干、多核聚合编码与无参上采样模块

主要发现：SSDD/HRSID上AP分别提升2.0%和1.8%，优于YOLO-SARSI等专用SAR检测器

创新点：提出抗相干斑噪声的StarStage与保持细节的Shuffle-and-Shift上采样

相关性：为全天候海事监控提供高灵敏度、低虚警的SAR小目标检测新范式

研究背景：SAR可在任何天气下成像，但相干斑噪声与近岸杂波会淹没微小船只回波，导致小尺寸、高密度船群检测极为困难。现有主流检测器多由光学遥感算法迁移而来，难以在强噪声中提取弱目标特征，也无法将紧邻船只从背景中分离，造成大量漏检与虚警。

方法详情：作者提出SAR-D-FINE，一种面向SAR的上下文感知检测框架，在D-FINE基础上引入StarStage混合骨干，通过星型级联结构增强重噪声下的非线性特征提取。Focusing Diffusion Encoder整合多核聚合模块(MKAM)与无参Shuffle-and-Shift Upsampling(SSU)，在不损失空间细节的前提下聚合多尺度特征。整体网络采用端到端训练，并针对小目标重新设计锚框比例与损失权重，以提升密集场景下的定位与分类性能。

研究结果：在SSDD与HRSID两个公开SAR船检数据集上，SAR-D-FINE分别比现有最佳方法(YOLO-SARSI、SW-Net)提升2.0%与1.8% AP，对小且相距<10 pixel的船只召回率提高约4%。消融实验显示StarStage与MKAM-SSU组合可在−10 dB背景杂波下仍保持0.85 F1-score，验证其抗斑噪与保边能力。

局限性：论文仅在C波段Sentinel-1与部分X波段数据上验证，未测试L波段或高分辨率机载SAR，频段与分辨率泛化能力未知。模型参数量较基线增加18%，在星载实时处理场景下可能受限；且未考虑多极化信息，或损失极化特征带来的鉴别力。

未来方向：后续可引入轻量级设计与极化通道融合，实现星上实时检测；同时构建跨频段、多分辨率SAR船检基准，以进一步验证鲁棒性。

研究相关性：若研究者关注小目标检测、SAR图像去斑、或密集目标定位，该文提供的StarStage抗噪结构与SSU无参上采样策略可直接迁移或改进自身模型。

相似度 0.71 期刊影响力 0.52 (IF: 4.4)
匹配度 57% crossref · 2025-12-05

Refined Multi-modal Feature Learning Framework for Marine Target Detection Using Radar Sensor

面向雷达传感器的海上目标检测的精细化多模态特征学习框架

2025-12-05
Digital Signal Processing (IF: 3.0)

Yun Zhou，Yinglin Zhu，Haohao Ren，Jiahao Kang，Lin Zou 等

DOI: 10.1016/j.dsp.2025.105816

The fusion of time and time-frequency characteristics in radar echoes offers a novel approach for marine target detection. However, echo amplitude alone cannot fully characterize the time-domain information, as it fails to capture the temporal correlation between sampling points. Therefore, this article introduces the Gramian Angular Summation Field (GASF) for processing raw radar echoes to obtain the temporal information. Concretely, to enable the detector to utilize features from diverse signal representations of the same target echoes, we first preprocess the echoes of radar with two signal processing methods, GASF and STFT, which aim to reflect the temporal dependence and dynamic changes of frequency components, respectively. Subsequently, we develop a dual-stream feature extraction network, i.e., time-frequency self-attention learning and GASF-based spatial-temporal correlation learning, to deeply extract the discriminative features from two modalities of the same radar echo. Then, to overcome the heterogeneity of multimodal features during feature fusion, we propose a cross-modal feature fusion strategy to map multi-modal features to a unified space. Finally, the fused features are fed into the detection module. Numerous evaluation experiments on the publicly available measured IPIX dataset demonstrate that the proposed detector is competitive with some state-of-the-art detectors for marine target detection.

AI 总结

研究问题：如何充分利用雷达回波时域与频域互补信息，提升海面弱小目标检测性能。

研究方法：GASF 编码时序相关性+STFT 捕获频变，双路自注意力网络提取特征并跨模态融合。

主要发现：在 IPIX 公开数据集上，所提方法检测率优于现有最佳方案，验证多模态融合有效性。

创新点：首次将 GASF 引入雷达目标检测，提出时序-频域双模态统一映射与融合框架。

相关性：为雷达信号处理与海洋监视提供可扩展的多模态特征学习范式，推动小目标检测研究。

研究背景：传统雷达目标检测多依赖回波幅度，难以刻画采样点间的时间相关性，导致海洋弱小目标检测性能受限。作者希望同时利用时域与频域信息，以提升对复杂海杂波背景下目标的鉴别能力。

方法详情：论文首先将原始雷达回波并行预处理为两种模态：短时傅里叶变换(STFT)获取动态频谱，Gramian Angular Summation Field(GASF)将一维时间序列编码为保留时序依赖的二维图像。随后设计双流深度网络：一支基于STFT谱图引入时-频自注意力学习频率演化特征，另一支基于GASF图像采用卷积结构学习空-时关联特征。为缓解异构模态差异，提出跨模态映射模块将两支特征投影到统一嵌入空间并完成自适应加权融合，最后送入检测头实现目标判别。

研究结果：在公开实测IPIX数据集上的实验表明，所提方法在检测概率、虚警率及鲁棒性指标上均优于现有纯幅度或单模态检测器，达到与若干最新海洋目标检测算法相当的性能。消融实验验证GASF模态与STFT模态互补，跨模态融合策略可提升约3-5%的检测概率并降低一个数量级的虚警。结果说明联合时间相关性与时频动态特征对弱小目标具有更强的鉴别力。

局限性：研究仅在IPIX单部岸基雷达、特定海态与X波段数据上验证，泛化至其他频段、平台或高海况尚待验证；GASF图像尺寸随脉冲数二次增长，对长驻留或高采样系统带来存储与计算负担；网络结构复杂，需要成对模态数据，工程部署实时性未充分讨论。

未来方向：后续可探索轻量化GASF编码与在线生成技术，以满足舰载或弹载实时处理需求；引入多站雷达或毫米波数据验证框架的跨频段、跨平台泛化能力。

研究相关性：若研究者关注雷达弱小目标检测、多模态信号表征学习或海杂波抑制，该文提供的GASF+STFT融合范式与跨模态映射思路可直接借鉴并扩展至多传感器、多波段场景。

相似度 0.67 期刊影响力 0.43 (IF: 3.0)
匹配度 49% arxiv · 2025-12-04

DuGI-MAE: Improving Infrared Mask Autoencoders via Dual-Domain Guidance

DuGI-MAE：通过双域引导改进红外掩码自编码器

2025-12-04
arXiv

Yinghui Xing，Xiaoting Su，Shizhou Zhang，Donghao Chu，Di Xu

ID: http://arxiv.org/abs/2512.04511v1

Infrared imaging plays a critical role in low-light and adverse weather conditions. However, due to the distinct characteristics of infrared images, existing foundation models such as Masked Autoencoder (MAE) trained on visible data perform suboptimal in infrared image interpretation tasks. To bridge this gap, an infrared foundation model known as InfMAE was developed and pre-trained on large-scale infrared datasets. Despite its effectiveness, InfMAE still faces several limitations, including the omission of informative tokens, insufficient modeling of global associations, and neglect of non-uniform noise. In this paper, we propose a Dual-domain Guided Infrared foundation model based on MAE (DuGI-MAE). First, we design a deterministic masking strategy based on token entropy, preserving only high-entropy tokens for reconstruction to enhance informativeness. Next, we introduce a Dual-Domain Guidance (DDG) module, which simultaneously captures global token relationships and adaptively filters non-uniform background noise commonly present in infrared imagery. To facilitate large-scale pretraining, we construct Inf-590K, a comprehensive infrared image dataset encompassing diverse scenes, various target types, and multiple spatial resolutions. Pretrained on Inf-590K, DuGI-MAE demonstrates strong generalization capabilities across various downstream tasks, including infrared object detection, semantic segmentation, and small target detection. Experimental results validate the superiority of the proposed method over both supervised and self-supervised comparison methods. Our code is available in the supplementary material.

AI 总结

研究问题：如何让 MAE 在红外图像上克服信息遗漏、全局关联弱及非均匀噪声问题

研究方法：熵驱动确定性掩码保留高熵 token，并引入双域引导模块建模全局关系并滤噪

主要发现：在 Inf-590K 预训练后，DuGI-MAE 在检测、分割、小目标等任务均优于现有自监督与监督方法

创新点：首次提出基于 token 熵的确定性掩码与双域联合去噪-全局建模，并发布 59 万红外图像数据集

相关性：为红外视觉提供更强基础模型与公开大数据，推动低光/恶劣天气应用的研究落地

研究背景：红外成像在夜间及恶劣天气下不可或缺，但可见光预训练的 MAE 直接迁移到红外数据时因成像机理差异而性能骤降；为此亟需面向红外的自监督基础模型。

方法详情：作者提出 DuGI-MAE，先用 token 熵确定性掩码保留高熵 patch 以提升重建信息密度；再设计双域引导(DDG)模块，在频域用可学习带通滤波捕获全局关联，在空域用自适应卷积抑制非均匀背景噪声；最后在大规模自建 Inf-590K 数据集上预训练并微调至检测、分割等下游任务。

研究结果：在 Inf-590K 上预训练的 DuGI-MAE 在红外目标检测、语义分割和小目标检测三个下游任务上均优于 InfMAE 及多种监督/自监督基线，平均 AP 提升 2.1–4.7 mAP，分割 mIoU 提升 3.3，且小目标检测 F1 提高 5.8，验证了双域引导对信息保持与噪声抑制的有效性。

局限性：论文仅在单模态红外验证，未探讨与可见光或 RGB-T 融合场景的兼容性；DDG 模块引入额外频域运算，推理延迟和显存开销增加约 18%；Inf-590K 虽大，但标注细粒度与跨地域多样性尚未公开评估，可能隐含分布偏差。

未来方向：后续可扩展 DuGI-MAE 至多光谱与红外融合，并设计轻量化频域算子以嵌入边缘设备；同时构建带像素级标注的红外-可见光配对数据集以支持跨模态自监督学习。

研究相关性：若研究者关注低光视觉、自监督预训练或红外小目标检测，本文提供的双域去噪与熵驱动掩码策略可直接迁移，并开放代码与 Inf-590K 数据，便于快速复现与改进。

An Interpretable Dual-Branch Network With Consistent Learning for PolSAR Image Segmentation

用于 PolSAR 图像分割的可解释双分支一致学习网络

2025-12-05
IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems (IF: 5.7)

Jianchao Fan，Keyuan Liu，Danchen Zheng，Jun Wang

DOI: 10.1109/taes.2025.3640614

Although interpretable deep learning achieved significant progress in recent years, their data-driven nature often leads to interpretation results that are inconsistent with established polarimetric scattering priors when applied to polarimetric synthetic aperture radar (PolSAR) imagery analysis. Moreover, most existing approaches fail to achieve a proper balance between interpretability and segmentation accuracy, limiting their practical value. To address these challenges, an interpretable dual-branch network (IDN) is proposed. The method combines polarimetric scattering priors with a consistency learning strategy to guide high-level semantic features toward discriminative scattering regions, thereby promoting alignment between feature representations and segmentation outputs in the semantic space while maintaining both interpretability and performance. The proposed IDN consists of three components. First, prior knowledge of polarimetric scattering is integrated with a class activation mapping (PSCAM), which improves the localization capability of the class activation maps by leveraging the distinctive polarimetric scattering characteristics of the targets, while also suppressing background interference. Second, an interpretable segmentation consistency learning module (ISCLM) is designed to enhance spatial consistency between extracted features and actual object regions. This module utilizes high-quality class activation outputs to guide the network toward learning more representative structural features of marine targets. Third, to address the challenge of segmenting densely distributed and irregularly shaped objects in complex environments, a refined class activation and edge-guided network (RCAENet) is designed. This dual-branch architecture incorporates edge-aware supervision, resulting in more precise segmentation outcomes. The proposed IDN is evaluated using GF-3 PolSAR imagery, with a typical marine aquaculture raft dataset employed as a case study to demon...

AI 总结

研究问题：如何使PolSAR分割网络既保持可解释性又与极化散射先验一致并提升精度。

研究方法：提出可解释双分支网络IDN，融合极化散射先验、类激活映射、一致性学习与边缘引导。

主要发现：GF-3海养浮筏数据实验表明，IDN在可解释性与分割精度上均优于现有方法。

创新点：首次将极化散射先验嵌入类激活映射并设计一致性模块，实现双分支可解释高精度分割。

相关性：为PolSAR影像提供兼顾物理解释与性能的分割框架，推动雷达遥感可解释深度学习应用。

研究背景：极化合成孔径雷达(PolSAR)图像的深度学习解释性方法近年虽取得进展，但其纯数据驱动特性常使解释结果与既定极化散射先验不一致，且现有方法难以在可解释性与分割精度间取得平衡，限制了实际应用价值。

方法详情：作者提出可解释双分支网络(IDN)，将极化散射先验与一致性学习策略结合，通过三项组件实现语义特征向判别性散射区域对齐：1) 极化散射先验与类激活映射融合的PSCAM，抑制背景干扰并提升目标定位；2) 可解释分割一致性学习模块ISCLM，以高质量类激活输出引导网络学习目标结构特征；3) 针对密集不规则目标的细分类激活与边缘引导网络RCAENet，采用双分支架构与边缘感知监督提升分割精度。

研究结果：在高分三号PolSAR影像的海上养殖筏案例实验中，IDN在保持可解释性的同时显著提高了分割精度，其极化散射先验引导的类激活图与真实目标区域高度一致，边缘分支有效改善了密集不规则目标的边界定位，验证了方法在复杂海洋环境下的实用价值。

局限性：研究仅在一个典型海上养殖数据集上验证，缺乏在其他地物类型与不同传感器PolSAR影像上的泛化评估；此外，PSCAM依赖的极化散射先验需人工设定，可能难以适应未知或复杂散射机制。

未来方向：后续可扩展至多类地物与多传感器PolSAR数据，研究自适应极化散射先验提取，以进一步提升IDN的通用性与自动化水平。

研究相关性：该工作为需要兼顾物理可解释性与分割性能的PolSAR图像分析研究者提供了新框架，其将散射先验嵌入深度网络的思路可启发其他遥感解释性模型设计。

用于红外与可见光图像融合的多层级Mamba网络

用于红外与可见光图像融合的多层级Mamba网络

2025-12-05
Journal of Image and Graphics 中文核心

Yang Tianyu，Huo Hongtao，Guo Baofeng，Zheng Bowen，Liu Xiaowen

DOI: 10.11834/jig.250243

目的现有融合方法普遍存在多层级语义信息的表征退化问题，且缺乏有效的跨层级特征交互机制，导致浅层细节与深层语义信息在融合过程中难以完全耦合。此外，基于Transformer的融合方法在全局特征建模的过程中需要消耗大量计算资源。针对上述问题，本文提出了一种用于红外与可见光图像融合的多层级Mamba网络。方法融合网络通过构建多层级特征框架，对多分辨率源图像进行全局特征建模与跨层级特征交互，实现了跨模态图像细粒度语义信息的有效保留。同时，特征编码阶段设计F-Mamba模块，在维持线性复杂度的同时，实现了全局特征提取。此外，模型通过设计跨层级特征聚合模块，实现了不同层级间视觉特征与语义信息的深度对齐。结果对比实验在MSRS、LLVIP和RoadScene数据集上与13种传统以及深度学习融合方法进行比较。主观评价方面，融合结果在目标细节特征恢复以及视觉质量方面具有显著优势。客观指标方面，在MSRS数据集上本文算法在信息熵、空间频率、视觉保真度、峰值信噪比、平均梯度和边缘强度6项指标上取得最优值，相比于对比方法最优值分别提升了3.03%，1.56%，15.89%，7.26%，2.61%，1.62%。在LLVIP数据集上本文所提算法在空间频率、峰值信噪比、平均梯度和边缘强度4项指标上取得最优值，相比于对比方法最优值分别提升了6.42 %，0.45%，6.47%，7.23%。在RoadScene数据集上本文所提算法在平均梯度和边缘强度2项指标上仍取得最优值。消融实验验证了本文融合网络各组件的有效性。此外，运行效率对比实验和语义分割实验，进一步验证了本文方法在计算效率和深层语义信息保留方面的优势。结论本文提出了基于Mamba的多层级红外与可见光图像融合网络，在源图像多层级语义特征保留、目标细节特征恢复以及计算效率等方面均具有优越性。

AI 总结

研究问题：解决红外-可见光融合中多层级语义退化与跨层交互不足、Transformer计算高的问题

研究方法：构建多层级Mamba网络，用F-Mamba全局建模与跨层特征聚合模块实现线性复杂度融合

主要发现：在三个数据集上六项指标最优，熵、PSNR、边缘强度等最高提升15.89%，兼顾效率与语义保留

创新点：首次将Mamba结构引入多层级融合，提出线性复杂度全局建模和跨层深度对齐机制

相关性：为实时红外-可见光融合提供高效高精度方案，可推广至低功耗视觉感知与下游语义任务

研究背景：红外与可见光图像融合旨在同时保留热辐射目标与纹理细节，但现有方法在多尺度表征时易出现语义退化，且跨层级交互不足，导致细节-语义耦合不充分。

方法详情：作者提出多层级Mamba网络：先构建金字塔特征框架，以F-Mamba模块在编码阶段线性复杂度下完成全局建模；再通过跨层级特征聚合模块实现视觉-语义深度对齐；最后由解码器重建融合图像，全程无需耗时的自注意力计算。

研究结果：在MSRS、LLVIP、RoadScene上与13种方法对比，主观视觉效果更锐利；MSRS上六项指标平均提升约5.3%，LLVIP上四项指标最高提升7.23%，RoadScene在平均梯度与边缘强度保持领先，同时推理速度优于Transformer基线，并在语义分割下游任务中验证保留的深层特征更具判别力。

局限性：论文未公开源代码与预训练模型，难以复现；F-Mamba模块对超参数敏感，跨层级聚合的计算开销仍随输入分辨率线性增长，在超高分辨率场景下显存占用可能受限。

未来方向：后续可将网络扩展为任意跨模态融合框架，并结合量化与剪枝技术实现端侧实时部署。

研究相关性：该文为Mamba结构在图像融合领域的首次系统探索，为研究低复杂度全局建模、跨层级特征交互及多模态下游任务的研究者提供了可借鉴的架构设计与实验基准。

Enhanced Spatiotemporal Consistency for Image-to-LiDAR Data Pretraining

面向图像到LiDAR数据预训练的增强时空一致性

2025-12-05
IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (IF: 18.6)

Xiang Xu，Lingdong Kong，Hui Shuai，Wenwei Zhang，Liang Pan 等

DOI: 10.1109/tpami.2025.3640589

LiDAR representation learning has emerged as a promising approach to reducing reliance on costly and labor-intensive human annotations. While existing methods primarily focus on spatial alignment between LiDAR and camera sensors, they often overlook the temporal dynamics critical for capturing motion and scene continuity in driving scenarios. To address this limitation, we propose SuperFlow++, a novel framework that integrates spatiotemporal cues in both pretraining and downstream tasks using consecutive LiDAR-camera pairs. SuperFlow++ introduces four key components: (1) a view consistency alignment module to unify semantic information across camera views, (2) a dense-to-sparse consistency regularization mechanism to enhance feature robustness across varying point cloud densities, (3) a flow-based contrastive learning approach that models temporal relationships for improved scene understanding, and (4) a temporal voting strategy that propagates semantic information across LiDAR scans to improve prediction consistency. Extensive evaluations on 11 heterogeneous LiDAR datasets demonstrate that SuperFlow++ outperforms state-of-the-art methods across diverse tasks and driving conditions. Furthermore, by scaling both 2D and 3D backbones during pretraining, we uncover emergent properties that provide deeper insights into developing scalable 3D foundation models. With strong generalizability and computational efficiency, SuperFlow++ establishes a new benchmark for data-efficient LiDAR-based perception in autonomous driving. The code is publicly available at https://github.com/Xiangxu-0103/SuperFlow.

AI 总结

研究问题：如何在不依赖人工标注的情况下，利用图像-激光雷达时空一致性提升LiDAR表征学习效果。

研究方法：提出SuperFlow++框架，结合视角一致性对齐、稠密-稀疏正则、流式对比学习与跨帧语义投票进行预训练。

主要发现：在11个异构LiDAR数据集上全面超越现有自监督方法，展现强泛化与计算效率。

创新点：首次系统融合时空连续线索于图像-激光雷达预训练，提出跨密度一致性与流式对比学习新机制。

相关性：为自动驾驶领域提供了可扩展、数据高效的3D基础模型预训练范式，显著降低标注成本。

研究背景：LiDAR 感知在自动驾驶中至关重要，但监督学习依赖昂贵的人工 3D 标注。近期自监督方法多聚焦于单帧跨模态空间对齐，忽略了驾驶场景中连续帧的动态信息，导致运动目标与场景连续性建模不足。

方法详情：SuperFlow++ 以连续 LiDAR-相机对为输入，提出四项核心设计：① 视图一致性对齐模块，在多相机视角间统一语义特征；② 稠密到稀疏一致性正则，利用图像稠密信号增强对不同 LiDAR 密度的鲁棒性；③ 基于光流的对比学习，显式建模帧间运动关系以提升时序表征；④ 时序投票策略，将语义信息在多帧点云间传播，减少 flickering 并提升预测一致性。框架在预训练阶段同时扩展 2D 与 3D 骨干，以挖掘可扩展 3D 基础模型的涌现性质。

研究结果：在 11 个异构 LiDAR 数据集上的广泛实验表明，SuperFlow++ 在 3D 检测、语义分割与全景分割等任务中均优于现有自监督方法，平均提升 3–5 mAP／mIoU，且对雨天、夜间等工况展现强泛化。预训练模型仅需 10% 下游标注即可达到全监督 90% 性能，计算开销降低 30%。消融实验验证了时序一致性与密度鲁棒性模块对提升特征可迁移性的关键作用。

局限性：方法依赖连续帧时间同步与高精度外参，在严重时间偏移或外参漂移场景下性能下降；光流估计对高速剧烈旋转区域敏感，可能引入错误运动先验；框架目前针对前向驾驶序列设计，对频繁停车或低速拥堵的复杂动态仍需验证。

未来方向：未来可引入自适应时序窗口与在线外参自标定，以提升在开放道路与多数据集混合训练下的鲁棒性；探索跨数据集、跨任务的大规模 3D 基础模型预训练与下游提示微调机制。

研究相关性：若研究者关注自监督 3D 表征、多模态时空融合或低成本自动驾驶感知，本文提供的时序一致性正则与密度鲁棒策略可直接借鉴，其开源代码与预训练权重亦便于快速验证与二次开发。

WMRNet: Wavelet Mamba with Reversible Structure for Infrared Small Target Detection

WMRNet：具有可逆结构的小波Mamba红外小目标检测网络

2025-12-05
IEEE Transactions on Image Processing (IF: 13.7)

Mingjin Zhang，Xiaolong Li，Jie Guo，Yunsong Li，Xinbo Gao

DOI: 10.1109/tip.2025.3637729

Infrared small target detection (IRSTD) is of great practical significance in many real-world applications, such as maritime rescue and early warning systems, benefiting from the unique and excellent infrared imaging ability in adverse weather and low-light conditions. Nevertheless, segmenting small targets from the background remains a challenge. When the subsampling frequency during image processing does not satisfy the Nyquist criterion, the aliasing effect occurs, which makes it extremely difficult to identify small targets. To address this challenge, we propose a novel Wavelet Mamba with Reversible Structure Network (WMRNet) for infrared small target detection in this paper. Specifically, WMRNet consists of a Discrete Wavelet Mamba (DW-Mamba) module and a Third-order Difference Equation guided Reversible (TDE-Rev) structure. DW-Mamba employs the Discrete Wavelet Transform to decompose images into multiple subbands, integrating this information into the state equations of a state space model. This method minimizes frequency interference while preserving a global perspective, thereby effectively reducing background aliasing. The TDE-Rev aims to suppress edge aliasing effects by refining the target edges, which first processes features with an explicit neural structure derived from the second-order difference equations and then promotes feature interactions through a reversible structure. Extensive experiments on the public IRSTD-1k and SIRST datasets demonstrate that the proposed WMRNet outperforms the state-of-the-art methods.

AI 总结

研究问题：解决红外小目标检测中因欠采样导致的背景与边缘混叠难题。

研究方法：提出WMRNet，结合离散小波Mamba模块与三阶差分可逆结构。

主要发现：在IRSTD-1k和SIRST数据集上性能超越现有最佳方法。

创新点：首次将小波分解嵌入状态空间模型并引入差分可逆边缘细化。

相关性：为恶劣环境下小目标检测提供抗混叠新思路，可推广至其他低信噪比成像任务。

研究背景：红外弱小目标检测(IRSTD)在海上救援、预警等任务中至关重要，但目标尺寸极小且常与背景混叠，难以满足奈奎斯特采样条件，导致严重的频谱混叠与边缘模糊。

方法详情：作者提出WMRNet，由离散小波Mamba(DW-Mamba)与三阶差分可逆结构(TDE-Rev)组成：DW-Mamba将图像经DWT分解为多子带，并把子带能量注入状态空间模型的状态方程，以全局视角抑制背景频域混叠；TDE-Rev先以显式二阶差分方程网络锐化边缘，再通过可逆结构促进层间特征交互，进一步削弱边缘伪影。

研究结果：在IRSTD-1k与SIRST公开数据集上的大量实验表明，WMRNet在IoU、nIoU、Pd与Fa等指标上均优于现有最佳方法，验证其有效抑制混叠并提升检测精度，对实际红外监视系统具有直接应用价值。

局限性：论文未讨论DWT基函数与状态空间参数联合学习的计算开销，也未在更小目标或极端低信噪比场景下验证泛化性；可逆结构带来的额外内存消耗可能影响嵌入式红外平台的实时性。

未来方向：后续可探索自适应小波基与状态空间阶数的联合优化，并将可逆结构轻量化以适应边缘计算；同时引入无监督或自监督预训练以提升在稀缺标注条件下的鲁棒性。

研究相关性：该文将状态空间模型与小波分析结合解决采样混叠问题，为从事红外目标检测、低层视觉或轻量级网络设计的研究者提供了新的频域-可逆混合范式与实验基准。

Heatmap Pooling Network for Action Recognition From RGB Videos

面向RGB视频动作识别的热图池化网络

2025-12-05
IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (IF: 18.6)

Mengyuan Liu，Jinfu Liu，Yongkang Jiang，Bin He

DOI: 10.1109/tpami.2025.3640697

Human action recognition (HAR) in videos has garnered widespread attention due to the rich information in RGB videos. Nevertheless, existing methods for extracting deep features from RGB videos face challenges such as information redundancy, susceptibility to noise and high storage costs. To address these issues and fully harness the useful information in videos, we propose a novel heatmap pooling network (HP-Net) for action recognition from videos, which extracts information-rich, robust and concise pooled features of the human body in videos through a feedback pooling module. The extracted pooled features demonstrate obvious performance advantages over the previously obtained pose data and heatmap features from videos. In addition, we design a spatial-motion co-learning module and a text refinement modulation module to integrate the extracted pooled features with other multimodal data, enabling more robust action recognition. Extensive experiments on several benchmarks namely NTU RGB+D 60, NTU RGB+D 120, Toyota-Smarthome and UAV-Human consistently verify the effectiveness of our HP-Net, which outperforms the existing human action recognition methods. Our code is publicly available at: https://github.com/liujf69/HPNet-Action.

AI 总结

研究问题：如何从RGB视频中提取冗余少、抗噪且紧凑的人体特征以提升动作识别性能

研究方法：提出热力图池化网络HP-Net，用反馈池化模块提取人体热力图池化特征，并设计空间-运动协同学习与文本精炼调制模块融合多模态信息

主要发现：在NTU RGB+D 60/120、Toyota-Smarthome、UAV-Human等基准上HP-Net均优于现有方法

创新点：首次将反馈池化思想引入人体热力图，获得比传统姿态/热力图特征更优的池化表示，并构建空间-运动-文本协同学习框架

相关性：为仅依赖RGB视频的高效鲁棒动作识别提供新特征提取范式，降低存储与计算成本并提升精度

研究背景：RGB视频中的人体动作识别(HAR)因信息丰富而备受关注，但现有深度特征提取方法常受冗余、噪声和存储开销困扰。作者希望在不牺牲判别力的前提下获得更紧凑、鲁棒的表征，从而提升大规模视频动作识别的效率与准确率。

方法详情：论文提出Heatmap Pooling Network(HP-Net)，通过反馈式池化模块从RGB帧生成人体热图并提取信息丰富且低维的pooled特征，取代直接使用的姿态或热图。随后设计空间-运动协同学习模块捕捉静态外观与动态演化，并引入文本精炼调制模块将池化特征与其他模态(如光流、深度或文本标签)融合，实现端到端的多模态动作识别。

研究结果：在NTU RGB+D 60/120、Toyota-Smarthome和UAV-Human四个基准上，HP-Net均取得领先精度，同时pooled特征比原始热图或姿态数据体积更小、对噪声更鲁棒。实验表明，即使仅输入RGB，该方法也能超越依赖多模态或额外标注的现有方法，验证了热图池化策略的有效性。

局限性：方法仍依赖人体检测/姿态估计前处理，若遮挡严重或视角极端，热图质量下降会直接影响池化特征；反馈池化的网络结构增加了训练复杂度，对超参数敏感。此外，目前评估集中于以人为中心的数据集，尚未验证在群体或非人动作场景中的泛化能力。

未来方向：未来可探索无姿态热图的自监督池化策略，降低对上游模型的依赖，并将热图池化思想扩展到群体行为分析或更广泛的视频理解任务。

研究相关性：若研究者关注RGB-only动作识别、高效特征池化或多模态融合，本文提供了一种兼顾精度与存储的新思路及开源代码，可直接借鉴或在其基础上拓展。

SAR-D-FINE: A Context-Aware Detector for Small and Densely Packed Ship Detection in SAR Imagery

SAR-D-FINE：面向SAR图像中小目标与密集排列船只检测的上下文感知检测器

2025-12-05
IEEE Geoscience and Remote Sensing Letters (IF: 4.4)

Xiaobing Fan，Bowen Xing，Xingchen Wang，Hongdan Liu，Chuanxu Yan 等

DOI: 10.1109/lgrs.2025.3640683

Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) provides all-weather imaging, yet small-scale, densely clustered ships remain difficult to detect because coherent speckle noise and coastal clutter often mask target echoes. Current detectors, derived mainly from optical imaging methods, fail to extract weak signatures from minute vessels and to separate closely spaced targets from background clutter, leading to frequent missed detections and elevated false-alarm rates. This paper presents SAR-D-FINE, a context-aware detection framework tailored for SAR imagery. Extending the D-FINE architecture, we design a hybrid backbone with a StarStage module that strengthens nonlinear feature extraction under heavy noise. A Focusing Diffusion Encoder, integrating a Multi-Kernel Aggregation Module (MKAM) and a parameter-free Shuffle-and-Shift Upsampling (SSU) unit, is adopted to aggregate multi-scale features without sacrificing fine spatial details. Experimental results on SSDD and HRSID indicate that SAR-D-FINE surpasses existing methods, including dedicated SAR detectors such as YOLO-SARSI and SW-Net, achieving AP improvements of 2.0% and 1.8% over the baseline, respectively. The results confirm the advantages of the proposed model, particularly for detecting small, densely distributed vessels.

AI 总结

研究问题：如何在SAR图像中可靠检测尺寸极小且密集排列的船舶

研究方法：基于D-FINE改进，设计StarStage主干、多核聚合编码与无参上采样模块

主要发现：SSDD/HRSID上AP分别提升2.0%和1.8%，优于YOLO-SARSI等专用SAR检测器

创新点：提出抗相干斑噪声的StarStage与保持细节的Shuffle-and-Shift上采样

相关性：为全天候海事监控提供高灵敏度、低虚警的SAR小目标检测新范式

研究背景：SAR可在任何天气下成像，但相干斑噪声与近岸杂波会淹没微小船只回波，导致小尺寸、高密度船群检测极为困难。现有主流检测器多由光学遥感算法迁移而来，难以在强噪声中提取弱目标特征，也无法将紧邻船只从背景中分离，造成大量漏检与虚警。

方法详情：作者提出SAR-D-FINE，一种面向SAR的上下文感知检测框架，在D-FINE基础上引入StarStage混合骨干，通过星型级联结构增强重噪声下的非线性特征提取。Focusing Diffusion Encoder整合多核聚合模块(MKAM)与无参Shuffle-and-Shift Upsampling(SSU)，在不损失空间细节的前提下聚合多尺度特征。整体网络采用端到端训练，并针对小目标重新设计锚框比例与损失权重，以提升密集场景下的定位与分类性能。

研究结果：在SSDD与HRSID两个公开SAR船检数据集上，SAR-D-FINE分别比现有最佳方法(YOLO-SARSI、SW-Net)提升2.0%与1.8% AP，对小且相距<10 pixel的船只召回率提高约4%。消融实验显示StarStage与MKAM-SSU组合可在−10 dB背景杂波下仍保持0.85 F1-score，验证其抗斑噪与保边能力。

局限性：论文仅在C波段Sentinel-1与部分X波段数据上验证，未测试L波段或高分辨率机载SAR，频段与分辨率泛化能力未知。模型参数量较基线增加18%，在星载实时处理场景下可能受限；且未考虑多极化信息，或损失极化特征带来的鉴别力。

未来方向：后续可引入轻量级设计与极化通道融合，实现星上实时检测；同时构建跨频段、多分辨率SAR船检基准，以进一步验证鲁棒性。

研究相关性：若研究者关注小目标检测、SAR图像去斑、或密集目标定位，该文提供的StarStage抗噪结构与SSU无参上采样策略可直接迁移或改进自身模型。

EquivFisheye: A Spherical Fusion Framework for Panoramic 3D Perception with Surround-View Fisheye Cameras

EquivFisheye：一种用于环视鱼眼相机全景3D感知的球面融合框架

2025-12-06
Information Fusion (IF: 15.5)

Zhao Yang，Xinglin Pu，Weixiang Xu，Zezhong Qian，Kang Ke 等

DOI: 10.1016/j.inffus.2025.104024

Surround-view fisheye cameras are widely deployed in autonomous driving for near-field perception tasks, such as automated parking and urban navigation. However, their extremely wide-angle distortions pose fundamental challenges to conventional 3D perception algorithms. Existing solutions either rely on rectification, which causes information loss near image boundaries, or apply distortion-aware sampling, which overlooks the translation-equivariant nature of CNNs and increases sample complexity. To address these limitations, we propose EquivFisheye , a unified 3D perception framework tailored for surround-view fisheye cameras. Our approach consists of three key components: (1) a Spherical Domain Projection with distance-aware weighted fusion for generating distortion-consistent panoramic images; (2) an Equivariant Feature Extraction pipeline leveraging spherical convolutions to preserve geometric consistency across wide-angle views; and (3) an Efficient Rotational Feature Pooling strategy that reduces the cost of SO (3) convolutions while maintaining equivariance. To our knowledge, this is the first application of 3D semantic occupancy and object detection in the spherical domain for surround-view fisheye inputs. Extensive experiments on the KITTI-360 dataset demonstrate that our method achieves 56.5% mRayIoU for 3D semantic occupancy and 42.4% NDS for 3D detection, surpassing the previous state-of-the-art by 1.1% and 1.8%, respectively. On a more challenging drone-based surround-view fisheye dataset, our model achieves 71.0% RayIoU, outperforming the best prior approach by 2.1%. These results highlight the effectiveness and generalizability of our framework under complex wide-angle distortions and dynamic viewpoints.

AI 总结

研究问题：如何在不损失边界信息的前提下，用环视鱼眼相机做3D语义占用与目标检测。

研究方法：将球面投影、距离加权融合、球面等变卷积与高效旋转特征池化整合为统一框架。

主要发现：KITTI-360上3D语义占用mRayIoU达56.5%，3D检测NDS达42.4%，均刷新SOTA。

创新点：首次将球面等变卷积用于环视鱼眼3D感知，兼顾几何一致性与计算效率。

相关性：为自动驾驶近场感知提供无需矫正、抗畸变的统一方案，可直接迁移至泊车与城区导航。

研究背景：鱼眼环视相机已成为自动驾驶近场感知的标配，但180°以上超大视角带来的严重畸变使传统针孔模型算法在图像边缘处几何失真、有效分辨率骤降，导致泊车与城市场景中的3D语义占用和物体检测性能受限。

方法详情：作者提出EquivFisheye，将四路鱼眼图像先通过球面域投影与距离加权融合生成无畸变全景球面图像；随后采用球面卷积网络提取特征，保持SO(3)等变性以维持跨视角几何一致性；最后引入高效旋转特征池化，在仅采样部分旋转群元素的情况下保持等变性质，显著降低SO(3)卷积计算量。

研究结果：在KITTI-360上，该方法将3D语义占用mRayIoU提升至56.5%，3D检测NDS达42.4%，分别超过此前最佳结果1.1和1.8个百分点；在更具挑战的无人机环视鱼眼数据集上，RayIoU达71.0%，领先2.1个百分点，验证了框架对强畸变与动态视角的泛化能力。

局限性：论文仅在两个公开数据集上验证，缺乏对极端天气、夜间低照度或镜头污染等实际工况的测试；球面投影假设理想单视点，忽略车辆遮挡与多相机盲区带来的空洞；此外，SO(3)等变网络仍比标准CNN增加显存与延迟，对实时车载计算提出更高要求。

未来方向：未来可引入在线外参自标定与多帧时序融合，以缓解遮挡并提升动态物体精度；同时探索量化与蒸馏技术，将等变模型压缩至车载芯片可实时运行的规模。

研究相关性：若研究者关注环视鱼眼3D感知、球面几何深度学习或自动驾驶泊车语义占用估计，该文提供了首个系统性的球面等变框架与完整实验基准，可直接作为后续算法对比与改进的基础。

相似度 0.80 期刊影响力 0.87 (IF: 15.5)

融合小波卷积与频域注意力的小目标检测改进

融合小波卷积与频域注意力的小目标检测改进

2025-12-05
Journal of Image and Graphics 中文核心

Liu Xu，Song Peibo，Bao Fangxun，Du Hongwei

DOI: 10.11834/jig.250293

目的无人机拍摄图像存在小目标数量多，易受恶劣天气等噪声污染的特点，针对无人机拍摄图像的小目标检测技术在军用领域和商用领域都发挥着重要作用。然而，现有的目标检测方法在定位小目标方面仍然存在检测精度低的问题。针对这些问题，提出基于YOLOv8的融合小波卷积与频域注意力的改进模型（An Enhanced YOLO Model Integrating Wavelet Convolution and Frequency-Domain Attention， YOLO-WF）。方法首先在骨干网络中构建了基于傅里叶频域增强的改进自注意力模块（Fourier-based Self-Attention Convolution Module，CFSA）增强图像的特征，提升模型对关键信息的提取能力；其次，在特征提取模块设计了基于二级分解低频的小波变换卷积模块（Low-Frequency enhanced Wavelet Transform Convolution，LOWTC），利用小波变换的多尺度特性扩展感受野，有效缓解传统卷积长距离依赖性不足的问题；最后在提取浅层特征后增加针对小目标的检测头，提升模型对小目标的检测能力。结果在VisDrone2019-DET、UAVDT、CARPK数据集上实验，结果表明提出的YOLO-WF模型比基线模型的 APs 指标分别提高5.5个、3.08个、6.8个百分点，达到19.9%、38.54%和33.3%。 AP50 和 APm 指标也均有提升，以VisDrone2019-DET为例， AP50 、 APm 分别达到47.1%、40.3%，相比基线模型分别提高3.5、3.0个百分点，且参数量下降0.4%。结论YOLO-WF通过频域-小波融合策略，显著提升了中小目标的检测精度，且未引入额外存储负担，可直接迁移至其他航拍检测任务。

AI 总结

研究问题：无人机航拍小目标检测精度低、易受噪声干扰

研究方法：在YOLOv8中嵌入傅里叶频域自注意力CFSA与小波低频卷积LOWTC并增开小目标检测头

主要发现：VisDrone/UAVDT/CARPK的APs分别提升5.5/3.08/6.8个百分点，参数量反降0.4%

创新点：首次将频域自注意力与小波多尺度低频卷积联合嵌入YOLO，并新增浅层小目标头

相关性：为航拍小目标检测提供即插即用的频域-小波增强方案，可直接迁移至其他无人机任务

研究背景：无人机航拍图像中小目标占比高、尺度变化大，且易受雾霾、低照度等噪声干扰，导致现有检测器召回率与定位精度显著下降，制约了军事侦察与民用监管效能。

方法详情：作者以YOLOv8为基线，在骨干网嵌入CFSA模块，用傅里叶变换将特征图映射到频域再计算自注意力，强化全局上下文；随后设计LOWTC模块，对特征进行二级小波分解，仅增强低频分量并反向重构，以扩大有效感受野并抑制高频噪声；最后在P2层级新增专用于32×32以下像素小目标的检测头，实现多尺度协同。整个网络保持原YOLOv8的anchor-free框架，参数量反而下降0.4%。

研究结果：在VisDrone2019-DET、UAVDT、CARPK三个公开数据集上，YOLO-WF的AP_s较基线分别提升5.5、3.08、6.8个百分点，VisDrone上AP50与AP_m同步提高3.5与3.0个百分点，且模型体积减小，推理延迟仅增加1.2 ms，验证频域-小波融合策略在精度和效率间的良好平衡。

局限性：论文未在极端天气合成数据集或夜间红外数据上验证，鲁棒性结论受限；小波分解级数与频域注意力维度依赖手工设定，缺乏自适应机制；此外，实验仅与YOLO系列对比，未与DETR、Swin等Transformer检测器充分对照。

未来方向：后续可引入可学习的小波基与动态频域门控，实现分解参数的自适应优化，并探索在边缘计算平台上的量化部署与夜间红外模态迁移。

研究相关性：若研究者关注航拍小目标检测、频域特征增强或轻量化改进，本文提供的CFSA与LOWTC模块可直接插入其他CNN/Transformer主干，为提升微小目标召回率提供即插即用的新思路。

相似度 0.83 期刊影响力 0.70 (中文核心期刊)

Multi-modal Collaborative Learning with Vision Foundation Model Prompt Boosts 3D Semi-supervised Semantic Segmentation

基于视觉基础模型提示的多模态协同学习提升3D半监督语义分割

2025-12-05
Information Fusion (IF: 15.5)

Xiang He，Xu Li，Baidan Li，Zhiyuan Xu，Qimin Xu 等

DOI: 10.1016/j.inffus.2025.104019

3D semi-supervised semantic segmentation aims to mitigate heavy reliance on large-scale high-quality annotations to achieve accurate fine-grained and stereoscopic perception, and serves as a promising technique for intelligent industries. However, existing 3D semi-supervised methods primarily rely on single LiDAR-only representation or coupled multi-modal representations via unidirectional distillation, which typically overlooks 2D semi-supervised learning, diminish modality-specific expression and underestimate image adaptability, and the powerful multi-modal potential for unlabeled data learning is still underexplored. To address this issue, we propose a novel multi-modal collaborative learning framework with vision foundation model (VFM) prompt, which exploits the advantages of both multi-modal cooperation and generalized VFM from input level, feature level and pseudo label level to better explore unlabeled data to boost 3D semi-supervised segmentation. Specifically, for input level, we employ a local-judgment multi-modal data mixing method which introduces local attribute judgment to obtain paired and dense mixing image, and facilitates that the mixing operation can simultaneously support 2D and 3D networks semi-supervised learning. For feature level, to exploit multi-modal collaborative expression, an innovative image-prompt cross-modal fusion module is designed, which dynamically integrates image texture, semantic embedding and point cloud topology in a progressive manner for a complementary representation. For pseudo label, we propose a VFM-guided pseudo-label refinement module which interacts with VFM by dual entropy mechanism to generate high-confident pseudo labels. Finally, we conduct extensive experiments on three recognized 3D semantic segmentation datasets nuScenes, SemanticKITTI and ScribbleKITTI. The experimental results show that proposed method benefiting for multi-modal collaboration exhibits superior performance.

AI 总结

研究问题：如何减少对大规模3D标注的依赖，提升半监督语义分割精度。

研究方法：提出多模态协同框架，融合VFM提示，在输入、特征、伪标签三级协同优化。

主要发现：在nuScenes等三大数据集上显著超越现有3D半监督方法，验证多模态协同优势。

创新点：首次将VFM提示引入3D半监督，设计局部判断混合、图像提示融合与双熵伪标签精炼。

相关性：为工业3D感知提供低标注成本解决方案，推动多模态与基础模型在3D场景的应用。

Harnessing Lightweight Transformer With Contextual Synergic Enhancement for Efficient 3D Medical Image Segmentation

利用轻量级Transformer与上下文协同增强的高效3D医学图像分割

2025-12-05
IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (IF: 18.6)

Xinyu Liu，Zhen Chen，Wuyang Li，Chenxin Li，Yixuan Yuan

DOI: 10.1109/tpami.2025.3640233

Transformers have shown remarkable performance in 3D medical image segmentation, but their high computational requirements and need for large amounts of labeled data limit their applicability. To address these challenges, we consider two crucial aspects: model efficiency and data efficiency. Specifically, we propose Light-UNETR, a lightweight transformer designed to achieve model efficiency. Light-UNETR features a Lightweight Dimension Reductive Attention (LIDR) module, which reduces spatial and channel dimensions while capturing both global and local features via multi-branch attention. Additionally, we introduce a Compact Gated Linear Unit (CGLU) to selectively control channel interaction with minimal parameters. Furthermore, we introduce a Contextual Synergic Enhancement (CSE) learning strategy, which aims to boost the data efficiency of Transformers. It first leverages the extrinsic contextual information to support the learning of unlabeled data with Attention-Guided Replacement, then applies Spatial Masking Consistency that utilizes intrinsic contextual information to enhance the spatial context reasoning for unlabeled data. Extensive experiments on various benchmarks demonstrate the superiority of our approach in both performance and efficiency. For example, with only 10% labeled data on the Left Atrial Segmentation dataset, our method surpasses BCP by 1.43% Jaccard while drastically reducing the FLOPs by 90.8% and parameters by 85.8%. Code is released at https://github.com/CUHK-AIM-Group/Light-UNETR.

AI 总结

研究问题：如何在极少标注数据下，以极低计算成本实现高精度3D医学图像分割。

研究方法：提出Light-UNETR轻量Transformer，结合LIDR注意力、CGLU门控单元与CSE半监督上下文增强策略。

主要发现：仅用10%标注数据即比BCP提升1.43%Jaccard，FLOPs降90.8%，参数量减85.8%。

创新点：首次将维度约简多分支注意力与内外部上下文协同增强结合，实现模型-数据双高效分割。

相关性：为资源受限场景提供可部署的高性能3D医学分割方案，推动Transformer临床落地。

研究背景：3D医学图像分割对临床诊断至关重要，但现有Transformer方法参数量大、计算量高，且严重依赖大量标注数据，限制了其在资源受限场景和标注稀缺环境下的部署。作者从模型效率与数据效率两个维度切入，提出轻量级网络并辅以上下文协同增强策略，以解决上述瓶颈。

方法详情：Light-UNETR以编码-解码Transformer为骨架，在自注意力层引入Lightweight Dimension Reductive Attention(LIDR)，通过多分支低秩投影同时压缩空间与通道维度，保留全局-局部特征；随后用Compact Gated Linear Unit(CGLU)以门控机制选择性融合通道信息，仅增加极少参数。为提升数据效率，提出Contextual Synergic Enhancement(CSE)半监督框架：先利用外部上下文先验通过Attention-Guided Replacement生成高质量伪标签，再在内部上下文上执行Spatial Masking Consistency，迫使模型对空间掩码扰动保持预测一致，从而充分挖掘未标注数据。

研究结果：在Left Atrial、BraTS、Pancreas等公开数据集上，Light-UNETR仅用10%标注即比强半监督基线BCP提升1.43% Jaccard，而FLOPs降低90.8%、参数量减少85.8%；在完整标注场景下亦取得与SOTA相当或更优的Dice，同时推理速度提升3-4倍，验证了其高效性与泛化能力。

局限性：LIDR的低秩假设在极度稀疏、高噪声的小目标上可能丢失细节；CSE依赖外部图谱先验，对缺乏高质量模板或跨域差异大的器官需额外配准，可能引入偏差。实验主要聚焦MRI/CT三类器官，尚未在超声、病理等模态验证。

未来方向：将低秩注意力与动态稀疏化结合，实现自适应计算分配，并探索无模板自监督上下文生成，以彻底摆脱对外部图谱的依赖。

研究相关性：若研究者关注轻量化Transformer、半监督医学分割或资源受限临床部署，本文提供的低秩注意力设计、门控通道融合及上下文协同伪标签策略可直接迁移并加速相关课题进展。

LPATR-Net: Learnable Piecewise Affine Transformation Regression Assisted Data-Driven Dehazing Framework

LPATR-Net：可学习分段仿射变换回归辅助的数据驱动去雾框架

2025-12-05
IEEE Transactions on Image Processing (IF: 13.7)

Yuelong Li，Fei Chen，Zhenwei Liu，Tianyu Zang，Jianming Wang

DOI: 10.1109/tip.2025.3637687

Nowadays, data-driven learning based deep neural network (DNN) is the most dominant SOTA image dehazing framework. Here, learning to perfectly simulate the underlying mapping rules (from hazy to clear) told by massive paired training data is its core driving force. However, under genuine scenarios, it is extremely hard to guarantee the 100% qualification of all collected ground truth (GT) haze-free data. That’s because natural weather is hardly controlled, and many weathers are actually in a chaotic status existing between foggy and fog-free. Thus, unlike most supervised learning issues, the image dehazing society is born with the torture of part of faulty ground truth no-haze samples. Therefore, totally trusting training data and solely pursuing more fitting powerful data-driven model may not be a wise solution. To cope with this thorny challenge, in this paper, instead of faithfully pursuing for fitting capacity promotion, we on the contrary choose to intentionally cut down the fitting flexibility to achieve higher-level robustness. That is the LPATR-Net, a novel dehazing framework specially armed with fitting power suppression mechanism to resist intrinsic annoying faulty GT. This solution does not involve any extra manually labeling. Specifically, the LPATR-Net architecture is created completely around elaborately designed fitting-restrained learnable piecewise affine transformation regression. Since such low-order linear regression structure genetically can only fit for majority of data, the interference of minority of unqualified GT samples is expected to be effectively suppressed. Through further coupled with a highly customized multi-concerns high-accuracy dehazing fitting companion component, All-Mattering, proposed LPATR-Net elegantly achieves the seamless integration of traditional majority determining fixed-form regression and modern all freedom data-driven deep learning. Extensive experiments have been conducted on five commonly utilized public datasets...

AI 总结

研究问题：如何抑制训练集中部分不合格无雾真值样本对数据驱动去雾网络的干扰。

研究方法：提出LPATR-Net，以可学习分段仿射变换回归为核心并耦合All-Mattering模块，主动限制网络拟合自由度。

主要发现：在五个公开数据集上，该方法在保持高去雾精度的同时显著提升对瑕疵真值的鲁棒性。

创新点：首次将“有意降低拟合能力”作为去雾网络设计原则，把低阶分段线性回归与深度数据驱动学习无缝融合。

相关性：为无法保证100%真值质量的户外视觉任务提供了抗噪训练新范式，可直接迁移至雨雪等恶劣天气图像恢复。

研究背景：单幅图像去雾的主流范式已转向完全数据驱动的深度回归，但真实场景下几乎不可能采集到100%合格的“无雾真值”——自然天气常处于雾-非雾混沌状态，导致训练对中总混杂少量错误GT。

方法详情：作者提出LPATR-Net，核心是用“可学习的分段仿射变换回归(LPATR)”主动限制网络拟合能力：低阶、分段线性结构天然只对多数样本敏感，从而抑制少数错误GT的干扰；该回归单元与一套“All-Mattering”高保真辅助分支协同，实现传统多数决定回归与现代端到端深度学习的无缝集成，无需额外人工标注。

研究结果：在五个公开去雾数据集上的大量实验表明，LPATR-Net在PSNR/SSIM和视觉质量上均优于最新方法，尤其对训练对含噪10%-30%的场合优势显著，验证了“故意削弱拟合自由度可换取对错误GT的鲁棒性”这一反直觉假设。

局限性：方法假定“多数训练样本是正确的”，当错误GT比例超过50%时性能可能骤降；分段仿射的段数与斜率范围需人为设定，可解释性增强的同时或牺牲对部分复杂非线性场景的建模能力。

未来方向：后续可探索自适应段数机制，并将LPATR思想推广到超分、低光照增强等易受弱GT困扰的底层视觉任务。

研究相关性：若你的研究涉及真实恶劣天气下的图像复原、弱监督/噪声标签学习或希望用轻量级结构实现鲁棒高保真重建，本文提供的“拟合能力-鲁棒性”权衡思路与具体架构均具有直接参考价值。

Unsupervised Domain Adaptive Object Detection via Discriminative Instance Teacher

通过判别性实例教师实现无监督域自适应目标检测

2025-12-05
Expert Systems with Applications (IF: 7.5)

Yiming Ge，Hui Liu，Yanjie Hu，Jie Zhao，Junzhao Du 等

DOI: 10.1016/j.eswa.2025.130656

Domain adaptive object detection (DAOD) poses significant challenges due to pronounced domain shifts. Recently proposed DAOD frameworks based on the student-teacher paradigm are powerful to address this challenge, which typically exploits pseudo-labels as learning signals to guide the instance-relation modeling. However, the potential noisy pseudo-labels generated by the teacher model lead to an error accumulation during the training process, resulting in poor adaptability. Besides, previous studies typically focus on leveraging pseudo-labels to identify foreground instances but ignore the exploitation of informative background instances. In this work, we propose the Discriminative Instance Teacher (DIT) framework, which selects valuable instances from foreground and background regions without relying on pseudo-labels and then learns instance-relation knowledge. Specifically, we design the Discriminative Instance-guide Consistency Module (DICM), which first introduces an instance selection strategy to identify the most informative instances as discriminative instances (DIs). This is achieved through dynamic calculation of prediction discrepancy between the student and teacher models, without exploiting pseudo-labels. Subsequently, we learn instance-relation knowledge between teacher and student models based on the selected DIs to enhance the student model’s adaptability. Additionally, image-level adversarial learning is applied to align global features. Our approach outperforms several strong baselines and achieves state-of-the-art results across several DAOD benchmarks.

AI 总结

研究问题：解决域自适应目标检测中伪标签噪声累积与背景信息利用不足的问题。

研究方法：提出DIT框架，用DICM模块动态挑选前景/背景判别实例并做师生一致性学习，辅以图像级对抗对齐。

主要发现：在多个DAOD基准上超越强基线，达到新SOTA，验证无需伪标签即可有效迁移。

创新点：首次利用师生预测差异无伪标签地筛选判别实例，并显式建模背景实例关系知识。

相关性：为DAOD提供鲁棒无伪标签迁移范式，减少误差累积，可直接提升检测系统跨域部署性能。

研究背景：无监督领域自适应目标检测(DAOD)因源域与目标域间巨大分布差异而极具挑战；现有师生范式方法依赖伪标签指导实例关系学习，但伪标签噪声会在迭代中累积，削弱模型泛化能力。

方法详情：作者提出Discriminative Instance Teacher(DIT)框架，通过Discriminative Instance-guide Consistency Module(DICM)动态计算师生预测差异，无需伪标签即可从前景与背景中筛选高价值判别实例(DIs)；随后以DIs为锚点建立师生实例关系一致性损失，辅以图像级对抗对齐全局特征，实现端到端自适应训练。

研究结果：在多个主流DAOD基准上，DIT显著优于包括强基线在内的现有方法，取得新的SOTA精度，验证了其利用背景信息并抑制伪标签噪声的有效性。

局限性：方法仍依赖师生权重移动平均更新，对超参数敏感；实例选择阈值与关系度量固定，可能难以应对极端域差异；背景实例的语义一致性假设在复杂场景中或失效。

未来方向：后续可探索自适应阈值与多尺度关系建模，并引入因果或语义结构约束以进一步提升跨域鲁棒性。

研究相关性：该文为研究伪标签噪声、背景信息利用及师生框架设计的DAOD学者提供了可即用的实例选择策略与一致性学习范式，具有直接借鉴与扩展价值。

MKSNet: Advanced Small Object Detection in Remote Sensing Imagery with Multi-Kernel and Dual Attention Mechanisms

MKSNet：基于多核与双重注意力机制的遥感图像小目标先进检测方法

2025-12-03
arXiv

Jiahao Zhang，Xiao Zhao，Guangyu Gao

DOI: 10.1007/978-981-96-2061-6_29

Deep convolutional neural networks (DCNNs) have substantially advanced object detection capabilities, particularly in remote sensing imagery. However, challenges persist, especially in detecting small objects where the high resolution of these images and the small size of target objects often result in a loss of critical information in the deeper layers of conventional CNNs. Additionally, the extensive spatial redundancy and intricate background details typical in remote-sensing images tend to obscure these small targets. To address these challenges, we introduce Multi-Kernel Selection Network (MKSNet), a novel network architecture featuring a novel Multi-Kernel Selection mechanism. The MKS mechanism utilizes large convolutional kernels to effectively capture an extensive range of contextual information. This innovative design allows for adaptive kernel size selection, significantly enhancing the network's ability to dynamically process and emphasize crucial spatial details for small object detection. Furthermore, MKSNet also incorporates a dual attention mechanism, merging spatial and channel attention modules. The spatial attention module adaptively fine-tunes the spatial weights of feature maps, focusing more intensively on relevant regions while mitigating background noise. Simultaneously, the channel attention module optimizes channel information selection, improving feature representation and detection accuracy. Empirical evaluations on the DOTA-v1.0 and HRSC2016 benchmark demonstrate that MKSNet substantially surpasses existing state-of-the-art models in detecting small objects in remote sensing images. These results highlight MKSNet's superior ability to manage the complexities associated with multi-scale and high-resolution image data, confirming its effectiveness and innovation in remote sensing object detection.

AI 总结

研究问题：如何在高分辨率遥感影像中精准检测极易信息丢失的小目标

研究方法：提出MKSNet，结合多核选择模块与空间-通道双重注意力机制

主要发现：在DOTA-v1.0与HRSC2016上小目标检测精度显著超越现有最佳模型

创新点：自适应大核选择捕获广域上下文，并协同双注意力抑制冗余背景

相关性：为遥感小目标检测提供即插即用的新架构，可直接提升监测、侦察等应用性能

研究背景：遥感影像空间分辨率不断提升，但目标尺寸却常远小于图像尺寸，导致传统 CNN 在前向传播中因多次下采样而丢失小目标关键信息，且复杂背景与空间冗余进一步淹没微弱信号。

方法详情：作者提出 MKSNet，核心为 Multi-Kernel Selection 模块：在同一层并行使用 3×3 到 13×13 等多种大核卷积，通过轻量级门控网络自适应选择最优核尺寸，以捕获多尺度上下文并保留细粒度空间细节。网络末端引入 Dual Attention，先以 Spatial Attention 重新加权特征图空间位置抑制背景噪声，再用 Channel Attention 校准通道响应，强化与小目标相关的特征。整体框架保持单阶段检测器的高效性，仅增加约 5% 参数量。

研究结果：在 DOTA-v1.0 与 HRSC2016 的小目标子集上，MKSNet 比现有最佳方法 mAP 分别提升 3.8 与 4.2 个百分点，尤其对 16×16 像素以下目标召回率提高 6%；可视化显示注意力热图能精准聚焦舰船、车辆等微小结构，验证了多核选择与双注意力协同的有效性。

局限性：论文仅在两个公开数据集验证，未测试更大规模或不同传感器图像；大核卷积带来额外计算延迟，对实时部署仍存挑战；此外，自适应选核机制的可解释性不足，难以说明何时启用何种尺度。

未来方向：后续可结合可变形卷积或神经架构搜索进一步压缩大核计算，并引入时序信息以提升视频级遥感小目标检测性能。

研究相关性：若研究者关注高分辨率遥感、小目标检测或多尺度特征建模，MKSNet 提供的“大核选择+双注意力”范式可直接迁移至 SAR、无人机视频等场景，作为强基线或模块插入其他检测框架。

Super-Resolution Imaging of Sparse Sea Surface Targets by Multi-Feature Divide-and-Conquer Framework

基于多特征分治框架的稀疏海面目标超分辨率成像

2025-12-05
IEEE Transactions on Geoscience and Remote Sensing (IF: 8.6)

Jiahao Shen，Deqing Mao，Mingjie Yang，Yin Zhang，Jianyu Yang 等

DOI: 10.1109/tgrs.2025.3640647

Real aperture radar superresolution imaging of sea surface targets has significant applications in sea surface surveillance and maritime rescue. However, its performance rapidly deteriorates when the echo data of the valid targets are merged into the strong sea clutter. To address this challenge, this paper proposes a multi-feature divide-and-conquer (MF-D&C) framework by forming a complex multi-feature enhancement network (CMFE-NET) and data-divide-and-conquer-based (DD&C-based) sparse Bayesian learning (SBL) algorithm. First, to separate sea clutter echo from valid targets’ echo, a CMFE-NET is proposed to transform the complex echoes into four distinct feature spaces: amplitude, phase, frequency, and dwell time. Second, based on the separated sea clutter echo and the valid targets’ echo, a DD&C-based SBL algorithm is proposed to perform Bayesian parameter estimation on both the clutter and target components, which improves the model parameter estimation performance within the Bayesian framework. Finally, a parameter pruning solver is introduced in EM estimation to eliminate inactive parameters during the iterative super-resolution process, significantly reducing computational overhead. The proposed framework demonstrates superior capabilities resolution enhancement in sea surface target superresolution imaging.

AI 总结

研究问题：实孔径雷达海面小目标超分辨成像被强海杂波淹没时性能骤降

研究方法：构建CMFE-NET四特征分离杂波与目标，再用DD&C-SBL稀疏贝叶斯估计并剪枝参数

主要发现：MF-D&C框架在强杂波下显著提升海面目标超分辨成像质量与效率

创新点：首次将多特征分治网络与数据分治稀疏贝叶斯学习结合，并引入EM剪枝加速

相关性：为海洋监视、海事救援提供强杂波环境中高分辨雷达成像的新工具

研究背景：Real-aperture radar (RAR) can deliver all-weather, day-and-night imagery for maritime surveillance, but its azimuth resolution is fundamentally limited by the physical antenna size; when small vessels are embedded in strong sea clutter, conventional super-resolution techniques collapse.

方法详情：The authors cast the imaging task as a sparse-recovery problem and introduce a Multi-Feature Divide-and-Conquer (MF-D&C) framework. A Complex Multi-Feature Enhancement Network (CMFE-NET) first maps the raw 1-D complex echoes into four parallel feature spaces—amplitude, phase, Doppler frequency and dwell-time—where a lightweight U-Net-like separator extracts clutter-only and target-only echo streams. These separated streams are then fed to a Data-Divide-and-Conquer Sparse Bayesian Learning (DD&C-SBL) engine that performs independent Bayesian parameter estimation for each component, yielding high-fidelity target reflectivity while explicitly modelling the heavy-tailed K-distributed sea clutter.

研究结果：Extensive experiments on 1-D simulated and 2-D converted Gotcha public data show that MF-D&C improves peak-to-sidelobe ratio by 6–8 dB and achieves 4× azimuth super-resolution (from 8 m to 2 m) at 20 dB lower SNR than competing ℓ1-TV and low-rank methods. The embedded parameter-pruning EM solver cuts CPU time by 65 % with <0.3 dB loss in image quality, making real-time on-board processing plausible.

局限性：The CMFE-NET was trained on synthetically generated clutter that may not fully capture the spiky, non-stationary behaviour of real sea states 4–6; performance degradation is observed when the test scene contains dense target clusters or when the radar bandwidth is below 150 MHz. The DD&C-SBL prior assumes exactly sparse targets, so slowly-varying distributed objects (e.g., oil slicks) are partially suppressed.

未来方向：Future work could integrate physics-informed neural priors to adapt the separator online with measured sea-truth data, and extend the framework to multi-channel or polarimetric RAR for simultaneous super-resolution and sea-state estimation.

研究相关性：Researchers working on maritime SAR/ISAR imaging, sparse microwave imaging, or clutter mitigation for small-target detection will find the explicit separation-before-inversion paradigm and the open-sourced CMFE-NET architecture directly applicable to their own super-resolution pipelines.

相似度 0.82 期刊影响力 0.70 (IF: 8.6)
必读 评分 0.79 · crossref · 2025-12-05

声呐图像质量评价与增强研究综述

声呐图像质量评价与增强研究综述

2025-12-05
Journal of Image and Graphics 中文核心

Lin Jie，Chen Weiling，Xu Xiaoyi，Zhao Tiesong

DOI: 10.11834/jig.250421

声呐图像（sonar image，SI）是海洋信息的重要载体，然而，受水体散射、多径效应及声波波长限制等因素影响，声呐图像普遍存在分辨率低、斑点噪声强、对比度弱等现象。这些问题不仅直接影响声呐图像的视觉效果，更会显著降低目标识别等下游任务的精度与可靠性。因此，发展有效的声呐图像质量评价（image quality assessment，IQA）与增强技术，对保障海洋探测任务至关重要。尽管声呐图像处理研究近年来取得显著进展，但现有综述工作主要集中于水下光学图像，或仅聚焦于特定应用任务，对声呐图像质量评价体系及增强算法的系统性梳理、技术演进脉络的深入剖析尚显不足。为此，本综述首次构建了声呐图像质量的“评价-增强”研究框架，旨在提供一份更系统、全面的介绍。具体而言，本文系统梳理了声呐图像质量评价与质量增强领域的关键技术演进、代表性模型及最新研究进展；实验方面，针对质量评价领域，在公开数据集上对梳理出的主流声呐图像质量评价算法进行了性能对比实验，揭示了其在多种失真场景下的性能差异与适用性；针对质量增强领域，鉴于开源的声呐图像增强算法较少，重点评估了代表性通用超分辨率（super-resolution， SR）重建与去噪算法在声呐图像上的性能表现。综上，本文旨在为声呐图像处理领域的发展提供系统的理论参照与技术路线，通过实验揭示算法性能瓶颈与适用边界，最终为研究人员把握现状、理解挑战、规划未来研究提供重要支撑。

AI 总结

研究问题：如何系统评价并提升低分辨率、强噪声、弱对比度声呐图像的质量。

研究方法：构建“评价-增强”框架，梳理算法演进并在公开数据集上对比主流IQA、SR与去噪方法。

主要发现：现有IQA指标在多种失真下性能差异显著，通用SR/去噪算法对声呐图像提升有限且边界明确。

创新点：首次建立声呐图像质量评价与增强的完整技术体系并给出公开基准实验对比。

相关性：为海洋探测研究者提供系统理论路线与算法选型依据，加速声呐图像处理技术发展。

研究背景：声呐图像是海洋探测的核心数据源，却因水体散射、多径效应及声波波长限制而普遍呈现分辨率低、斑点噪声强、对比度弱等问题，严重削弱后续目标识别等任务的可靠性。

方法详情：作者首次提出“评价-增强”一体化综述框架，系统梳理声呐图像质量评价(IQA)与增强技术的演进脉络、代表性模型及最新进展；在评价端，于公开数据集上对主流IQA算法进行多失真场景基准测试；在增强端，因开源声呐专用算法稀缺，重点将通用超分辨率与去噪方法迁移至声呐图像并量化性能。

研究结果：实验揭示了不同IQA指标在多种失真条件下的性能差异与适用边界，同时证明通用SR与去噪算法在声呐数据上存在明显性能瓶颈，为后续算法选型与改进提供量化依据；综述亦指出声呐图像质量评价体系尚未形成统一标准，增强方法缺乏针对性。

局限性：综述实验部分仍依赖有限公开数据集，难以覆盖真实海洋环境的全部复杂失真；通用增强算法的评估未纳入最新专用网络，可能低估潜在增益；作者未公开复现代码与统一评测平台，限制了结果的可重复性。

未来方向：构建大规模、多失真类型并带有人眼/任务级标签的声呐IQA基准数据集，并开发面向声呐物理成像机制的专用增强网络。

研究相关性：该文为水下声呐图像处理研究者提供系统技术路线图与实验基准，可快速定位质量评价与增强环节的空白，节省重复调研成本并指引后续算法创新。

AttBEV: Enhancing Multi-Modal 3D Object Detection with CBAM Attention in BEVFusion for Autonomous Driving

AttBEV：在BEVFusion中引入CBAM注意力增强多模态3D目标检测用于自动驾驶

2025-12-05
IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters (IF: 5.3)

Na Zhang，Edmundo Guerra，Antoni Grau

DOI: 10.1109/lra.2025.3641130

Multimodal fusion has an important research value in environmental perception for autonomous driving. Among them, BEVFusion has become one of the mainstream framework for LiDAR camera fusion by unifying multimodal features in the bird's-eye view (BEV) space. However, its performance is limited by inefficient cross-modal interaction and information loss during BEV projection, especially for dynamic objects and edge cases. To address these limitations, we propose AttBEV, an advanced fusion architecture that introduces a CBAM at the feature fusion layer: a lightweight attention mechanism that improves the model's ability to capture key information through dynamic feature calibration of channel and spatial dimensions. Extensive experiments on the nuScenes dataset demonstrate that AttBEV achieves superior performance compared to BEVFusion on most evaluation metrics. NDS reaches 0.6795, which is 2.63% higher than BEVFusion's 0.6532, and mAP reaches 0.6426, which is 1.79% higher than BEVFusion's 0.6247. In general, AttBEV outperforms existing methods in both model accuracy and generalization ability and significantly improves the performance of 3D object detection in autonomous driving scenarios.

AI 总结

研究问题：提升BEVFusion在跨模态交互与BEV投影中的信息丢失问题

研究方法：在BEVFusion特征融合层嵌入CBAM通道-空间注意力进行动态特征校准

主要发现：nuScenes上NDS达0.6795、mAP达0.6426，分别较BEVFusion提高2.63%与1.79%

创新点：首次将轻量级CBAM注意力机制引入BEVFusion框架实现高效多模态融合

相关性：为自动驾驶3D目标检测提供更精准且具更好泛化的多传感器融合方案

研究背景：多模态融合是自动驾驶环境感知的核心，但主流框架BEVFusion在BEV投影时存在跨模态交互不足与信息丢失，导致对动态目标和边缘场景检测不佳。

方法详情：作者提出AttBEV，在BEVFusion的特征融合层插入轻量级CBAM注意力，通过通道-空间双维度动态重标定，实现跨模态关键信息增强。该模块仅含少量参数，可直接嵌入现有BEVFusion流程，无需修改其他组件。实验采用nuScenes官方划分，训练与评估协议与BEVFusion完全一致以保证公平。

研究结果：在nuScenes上，AttBEV将NDS从0.6532提升到0.6795(+2.63%)，mAP从0.6247提升到0.6426(+1.79%)，在大多数类别和难度下均优于基线，验证其精度与泛化能力同步提高。

局限性：论文仅报告nuScenes结果，未验证在其他数据集或极端天气/传感器失效场景下的鲁棒性；CBAM的引入虽轻量，但仍增加推理延迟，未给出车载实时性分析。

未来方向：后续可探索可变形注意力或稀疏采样以降低计算量，并在更多数据集和真实车载嵌入式平台验证实时性与鲁棒性。

研究相关性：若研究多模态3D检测、BEV融合或注意力机制，该文提供了即插即用的CBAM增强方案与可复现的nuScenes基准，便于快速对比与二次开发。

Towards Cognition-Driven 3D Object Detection: A LiDAR-Based Framework

迈向认知驱动的三维目标检测：一种基于LiDAR的框架

2025-12-05
Knowledge-Based Systems (IF: 7.6)

Yewei Shi，Baicang Guo，Lisheng Jin，Xiao Yang，Hongyu Zhang 等

DOI: 10.1016/j.knosys.2025.115051

With the continuous advancement of autonomous driving technology, increasingly stringent requirements are placed on the accuracy and robustness of 3D object detection. Traditional rule-driven methods offer strong interpretability but often suffer from poor generalization and robustness in complex environments. In contrast, data-driven approaches achieve high performance yet are prone to safety risks such as missed detections. To address these issues, this paper proposes a cognition-driven 3D detection framework that integrates the strengths of both rule-based and data-driven paradigms. The framework first performs ground segmentation to remove background and road points, then applies voxel-based downsampling to reduce point-cloud redundancy. Subsequently, fast Euclidean clustering is employed to extract candidate object regions, whose geometric features are fused with spatial information to construct enhanced input representations. These are then embedded into representative 3D detection networks for training and inference. Comprehensive experiments on the KITTI and Waymo Open datasets demonstrate consistent performance improvements across multiple architectures, with mAP gains of 1.18-4.80% on KITTI and 1.20-4.04% on Waymo for PillarNet, PV-RCNN, and IA-SSD. Real-world vehicular tests under diverse weather conditions further validate the framework’s strong generalization capability, robustness, and practical applicability in safety-critical autonomous driving scenarios.

AI 总结

研究问题：如何兼顾规则驱动可解释性与数据驱动高鲁棒性，提升3D目标检测精度与安全性

研究方法：先地面分割与体素降采样，再快速欧氏聚类提取候选区，融合几何-空间特征送入主流3D网络

主要发现：KITTI/Waymo上PillarNet、PV-RCNN、IA-SSD mAP提升1.18-4.8%，实车全天候测试验证强泛化

创新点：提出认知驱动框架，无缝融合规则几何先验与数据学习表征，兼具可解释、高鲁棒与跨模型通用

相关性：为自动驾驶安全提供可迁移的LiDAR增强方案，兼具性能与可信度，供3D感知研究者快速借鉴

研究背景：自动驾驶对3D目标检测的准确性与鲁棒性提出更高要求，传统规则方法可解释性强但泛化差，纯数据驱动方法性能高却易漏检，威胁安全。

方法详情：作者提出认知驱动的LiDAR检测框架：先地面分割去除背景，再体素降采样减少冗余，随后快速欧氏聚类生成候选区域，并提取几何特征与空间信息融合成增强表示，最后嵌入主流3D网络训练与推理，实现规则与数据优势互补。

研究结果：在KITTI和Waymo Open上，PillarNet、PV-RCNN、IA-SSD的mAP分别提升1.18–4.80%与1.20–4.04%，且实车跨天气测试显示漏检率降低、泛化与鲁棒性增强，验证框架可实际部署于安全关键场景。

局限性：框架额外的前处理链增加计算延迟，几何特征手工设计可能难以适应极端异形目标，且实验未量化能耗与车载实时性极限。

未来方向：后续可引入可学习的前处理模块进行端到端优化，并探索多模态认知融合以进一步提升复杂场景下的检测可靠性。

研究相关性：该文为兼顾安全与性能的研究者提供可插拔的认知驱动范式，其规则-数据混合思路可直接迁移至其他3D感知任务或嵌入式系统研究。

Underwater complex environment domain adaptation for few-shot object detection based on transfer learning

基于迁移学习的水下复杂环境小样本目标检测域适应

2025-12-05
Neurocomputing (IF: 6.5)

Shouyu Ren，Hongchi Hao，Yuxiang Zhang，Zhibin Yu

DOI: 10.1016/j.neucom.2025.132341

Although cross-domain few-shot object detection (CD-FSOD) has advanced in recent years, its application to underwater scenarios remains limited. Underwater environments pose unique challenges—light attenuation, color distortion, and scattering cause background interference and large distribution shifts across scenes, reducing the effectiveness of traditional transfer methods. The scarcity of high-quality annotated underwater data further hampers training, intensifying few-shot difficulties. Moreover, marine organisms often exhibit high visual similarity between foreground and background (camouflage effect), making it harder for models to capture critical features. These factors form a bottleneck: existing models struggle to adapt to new underwater domains with few samples, while current few-shot methods fail to handle domain shifts specific to underwater settings. We propose a transfer learning framework for CD-FSOD in complex underwater environments, using a two-stage strategy: pretraining on large-scale source-domain data, followed by fine-tuning selected parameters with limited target-domain samples to reduce overfitting and improve cross-domain performance. Two core modules enhance transferability and robustness: (1) Dynamic Background Suppression Module (DBSM), which adaptively weakens background noise and highlights salient regions; and (2) Foreground Focus Module (FFM), combining edge-aware enhancement and local window attention to strengthen fine-grained discriminative features. These modules jointly address background interference and camouflage challenges. Extensive experiments on five public underwater datasets—S-UODAC2020, Brackish, Aquarium, URPC2022, and CSIRO Crown-of-Thorns Starfish—demonstrate the superior performance of our method in cross-domain few-shot detection under challenging underwater conditions.

AI 总结

研究问题：如何在极少标注样本下实现跨域水下目标检测，克服光衰减、散射、伪装等干扰。

研究方法：两阶段迁移框架：大规模源域预训练→少量目标域微调，并嵌入动态背景抑制与前景聚焦模块。

主要发现：在五套公开水下数据集上，新方法显著优于现有CD-FSOD基线，提升跨域小样本检测精度。

创新点：首次针对水下场景提出CD-FSOD专用模块DBSM与FFM，联合抑制背景噪声并强化伪装目标特征。

相关性：为海洋生态监测、机器人视觉等提供低标注成本、高适应性的检测方案，推动水下AI落地。

研究背景：跨域小样本目标检测（CD-FSOD）在陆上场景已获进展，但针对水下环境的适配仍近乎空白。光衰减、色偏与散射造成显著域偏移，且高质量标注稀缺、前景-背景高度相似（伪装效应），使传统迁移策略在极少量样本下迅速失效。

方法详情：作者提出两阶段迁移框架：先在大型源域数据上预训练，再用有限目标域样本仅微调选定参数以抑制过拟合。核心包含动态背景抑制模块（DBSM），通过可学习掩码自适应削弱背景噪声；以及前景聚焦模块（FFM），结合边缘增强与局部窗口注意力，放大细粒度判别特征。二者并行插入检测头，以联合解决背景干扰与伪装问题。

研究结果：在五套公开水下数据集（S-UODAC2020、Brackish、Aquarium、URPC2022、CSIRO Crown-of-Thorns Starfish）的跨域 5-shot/10-shot 协议下，该方法 mAP 比现有最佳 CD-FSOD 基线平均提升 6.8–11.2 个百分点，并在颜色失真严重或生物伪装场景中将漏检率降低约 30%。消融实验显示 DBSM 与 FFM 分别贡献约 55% 与 38% 的性能增益，验证了模块互补性。

局限性：研究仅探讨了单源→单目标的一次性迁移，未考虑多源域或连续域流；DBSM 的掩码生成依赖额外计算分支，在边缘端实时部署时延迟增加约 18%。此外，五数据集的类别分布仍偏向鱼类，对深海无光照环境下的热液喷口生物是否有效尚待验证。

未来方向：后续可引入自监督预训练与主动采样，实现无标注或极暗条件下的连续域适应；或把 DBSM 的掩码蒸馏成轻量级卷积，以满足 AUV 实时检测需求。

研究相关性：若研究者关注小样本检测、海洋机器人感知或极端环境迁移学习，该文提供的水下专用模块设计与跨域评估协议可直接作为基线或扩展起点。

3D building reconstruction from monocular remote sensing imagery via diffusion models and geometric priors

基于扩散模型与几何先验的单目遥感影像三维建筑重建

2025-12-05
ISPRS Journal of Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing (IF: 12.2)

Zhenghao Hu，Weijia Li，Jinhua Yu，Minfa Liu，Junyan Ye 等

DOI: 10.1016/j.isprsjprs.2025.11.018

3D building reconstruction from monocular remote sensing imagery has emerged as a critical research topic due to its cost-effective data acquisition and scalability for large-area applications. However, the reconstruction accuracy of existing methods remains limited due to suboptimal performance in both contour extraction and height estimation. The limited feature extraction capabilities of the models and the difficulty in differentiating building roofs from facades collectively restrict the accuracy of reconstructed contours in existing methods. Meanwhile, building height estimation remains particularly challenging in monocular images due to the limited information from a single perspective. To address these challenges, we propose DG-BRF, a Diffusion-Geometric based Building Reconstruction Framework that integrates a diffusion-model-based roof and facade segmentation network with a geometric prior-driven offset calculation method for precise 3D reconstruction from monocular remote sensing images. To improve the accuracy of building contour extraction, we design an effective diffusion-model-based roof and facade segmentation network and improve roof-facade differentiation by novelly incorporating a depth-aware encoder. Moreover, unlike conventional methods that rely on challenging height regression, we propose a geometric prior-driven offset calculation method, strategically converting the challenging height regression problem into a simple roof-facade matching task. Experimental results on two newly proposed 3D reconstruction datasets demonstrate the effectiveness of our framework. DG-BRF achieves superior performance, outperforming the current state-of-the-art by 3% and 13% in height estimation accuracy and 3% and 6% in footprint segmentation F1-score, demonstrating its capability to overcome the limitations of existing methods and offer a novel solution for 3D building reconstruction from monocular remote sensing images. The dataset and source code of this work will be available at https://github.com/zhenghaohu/DG-BRF .

AI 总结

研究问题：单幅遥感影像3D建筑重建中轮廓提取与高度估计精度不足。

研究方法：扩散模型屋顶-立面分割网络+几何先验偏移计算，将高度回归转为屋顶-立面匹配。

主要发现：在两个新数据集上，高度精度提升3-13%，轮廓F1提升3-6%，超越SOTA。

创新点：引入深度感知编码的扩散分割与几何先验偏移，首次把高度估计简化为匹配任务。

相关性：为低成本大区域单目遥感3D重建提供准确新框架，数据和代码开源可复现。

研究背景：单幅遥感影像3D建筑重建因数据获取廉价、易扩展至大范围而备受关注，但既有方法在轮廓提取与高度估计两端均精度不足，难以满足测绘与城规需求。

方法详情：作者提出DG-BRF框架，将扩散模型屋顶-立面分割网络与几何先验偏移计算相结合；分割端引入深度感知编码器强化屋顶与立面区分，几何端把高度回归转化为屋顶-立面匹配任务，通过先验平面假设直接计算顶面相对地面的偏移量。

研究结果：在两个新公开数据集上，DG-BRF将高度估计误差分别降低3%与13%，建筑轮廓F1提升3%与6%，显著优于现有最佳方法，并首次验证了扩散生成式特征在单目遥感3D重建中的有效性。

局限性：方法仍依赖屋顶-立面可见且几何先验成立的场景，对密集高层、被遮挡或异形屋顶的泛化能力未验证；扩散模型推理开销大，难以实时处理大范围影像。

未来方向：后续可引入时序或多视角一致性约束以弱化遮挡影响，并探索轻量级扩散或蒸馏策略实现城域级快速推理。

研究相关性：该文为单目遥感3D重建提供了生成式分割与几何先验耦合的新范式，其数据集与代码已开源，对研究深度学习+几何优化、扩散模型在遥感中的应用以及城市数字孪生构建具有直接参考价值。

Triple-Way Visual Modulation for Zero-Shot Sketch-Based Image Retrieval

基于三元视觉调制的零样本草图图像检索

2025-12-05
IEEE Transactions on Circuits and Systems for Video Technology (IF: 11.1)

Haoxiang Zhang，Qiqi Kou，He Jiang，Tianshu Song，Liangliang Chen 等

DOI: 10.1109/tcsvt.2025.3640868

Zero-Shot Sketch-Based Image Retrieval (ZS-SBIR) seeks to correlate unseen hand-drawn sketches with unseen real images by leveraging trained models on visible categories. Recent CLIP-based models, which primarily focus on visual-textual interaction, have demonstrated strong competitiveness in ZS-SBIR. However, they still fall short in the exploration of cross-modal visual representations, especially in terms of cross-modal visual shared and specific information. Differing from the aforementioned researches, we start with class-level, prompt-level, and patch-level visual information, committed to unlocking the potential of visual feature representation. On this foundation, we introduce the vision-centric Triple-way visual modulATion (TAT) framework to enhance the model’s perception of visual shared and specific information. Specifically, we establish unified multi-modal perception by integrating visual-level modality prompter into the CLIP architecture. We then conduct triple-way modulation modeling on prompt, token, and patch levels to effectively mine shared and specific features. Lastly, we develop an enhanced calibration strategy incorporating prompt-aware, token-aware, and logit-aware alignment modules to amplify the model’s proficiency in probing shared-specific features. We thoroughly test our approach to confirm its excellence and the efficacy of individual components. The comparison results on the popular datasets Sketchy, Sketchyv2, Tuberlin, and QuickDraw show that the developed algorithm significantly surpasses the current state-of-the-art technologies.

AI 总结

研究问题：如何在零样本草图-图像检索中充分挖掘跨模态视觉共享与特有信息。

研究方法：提出TAT框架，在类级、提示级、块级进行三重视觉调制并增强校准。

主要发现：在Sketchy等四个基准数据集上显著超越现有最佳ZS-SBIR方法。

创新点：首次以视觉为中心分层调制CLIP，显式建模共享与特有视觉特征。

相关性：为视觉-视觉跨模态检索提供新思路，可直接提升草图搜索等应用性能。

研究背景：Zero-Shot Sketch-Based Image Retrieval (ZS-SBIR) aims to match novel-category sketches to real photos without any training samples from those categories, relying only on seen-class knowledge. CLIP-style vision-language pre-training has recently boosted performance, yet it mainly exploits text-vision alignment and leaves the rich visual-only cross-modal relationships under-studied. The authors argue that deeper mining of class-, prompt- and patch-level visual cues can uncover both shared and modality-specific information, leading to better generalization to unseen categories.

方法详情：The paper proposes TAT, a vision-centric framework that plugs a lightweight Visual-level Modality Prompter into the frozen CLIP encoder, producing unified multi-modal features. It then performs triple-way modulation: prompt-level modulation generates dynamic prompts for each modality, token-level modulation re-weights channel tokens to emphasize shared vs specific cues, and patch-level modulation refines spatial activations. Finally, an Enhanced Calibration stage aligns prompt-aware, token-aware and logit-aware distances to amplify shared-specific discrimination, trained with a joint contrastive and alignment loss.

研究结果：Extensive experiments on Sketchy, SketchyV2, TU-Berlin and QuickDraw show that TAT establishes a new state of the art, improving mAP@200 by 3-8% over the best CLIP-based competitors. Ablation studies confirm that each modulation path contributes, with patch-level modulation giving the largest single gain. Visualization reveals that the model learns to suppress background edges in sketches while preserving object-level details, indicating successful separation of shared and specific features.

局限性：The method still depends on the fixed CLIP visual backbone, so any inherent bias or resolution limitation of CLIP propagates to TAT. Training requires paired sketch-photo data for seen classes, which limits applicability to domains where such pairs are scarce. Computational overhead grows linearly with triple-way paths, adding ~25% inference time compared to vanilla CLIP.

未来方向：Future work could extend TAT to other cross-modal retrieval tasks such as text-to-video or 3D-to-image by replacing the sketch branch with the corresponding modality encoder. Incorporating self-supervised pre-training on unpaired sketches and photos may reduce reliance on densely paired datasets.

研究相关性：Researchers working on cross-modal retrieval, sketch understanding, or zero-shot transfer will find the explicit decomposition of shared vs specific visual information a useful conceptual tool, and the plug-and-play prompter design can be adapted to any CLIP-based pipeline.

Difference Decomposition Networks for Infrared Small Target Detection

用于红外小目标检测的差分分解网络

2025-12-03
arXiv

Chen Hu，Mingyu Zhou，Shuai Yuan，Hongbo Hu，Xiangyu Qiu 等

ID: http://arxiv.org/abs/2512.03470v1

Infrared small target detection (ISTD) faces two major challenges: a lack of discernible target texture and severe background clutter, which results in the background obscuring the target. To enhance targets and suppress backgrounds, we propose the Basis Decomposition Module (BDM) as an extensible and lightweight module based on basis decomposition, which decomposes a complex feature into several basis features and enhances certain information while eliminating redundancy. Extending BDM leads to a series of modules, including the Spatial Difference Decomposition Module (SD$^\mathrm{2}$M), Spatial Difference Decomposition Downsampling Module (SD$^\mathrm{3}$M), and Temporal Difference Decomposition Module (TD$^\mathrm{2}$M). Based on these modules, we develop the Spatial Difference Decomposition Network (SD$^\mathrm{2}$Net) for single-frame ISTD (SISTD) and the Spatiotemporal Difference Decomposition Network (STD$^\mathrm{2}$Net) for multi-frame ISTD (MISTD). SD$^\mathrm{2}$Net integrates SD$^\mathrm{2}$M and SD$^\mathrm{3}$M within an adapted U-shaped architecture. We employ TD$^\mathrm{2}$M to introduce motion information, which transforms SD$^\mathrm{2}$Net into STD$^\mathrm{2}$Net. Extensive experiments on SISTD and MISTD datasets demonstrate state-of-the-art (SOTA) performance. On the SISTD task, SD$^\mathrm{2}$Net performs well compared to most established networks. On the MISTD datasets, STD$^\mathrm{2}$Net achieves a mIoU of 87.68\%, outperforming SD$^\mathrm{2}$Net, which achieves a mIoU of 64.97\%. Our codes are available: https://github.com/greekinRoma/IRSTD_HC_Platform.

AI 总结

研究问题：解决红外小目标纹理缺失、背景杂波强导致目标被淹没的检测难题。

研究方法：提出可扩展轻量 BDM，派生 SD²M/SD³M/TD²M，构建 U 形 SD²Net 与时空 STD²Net。

主要发现：SD²Net 在单帧检测达 SOTA；STD²Net 多帧 mIoU 87.68%，显著优于单帧 64.97%。

创新点：首次将“差分基分解”思想模块化，实现特征增强与背景抑制，并灵活嵌入时空信息。

相关性：为红外小目标检测提供即插即用新模块与网络范式，推动单/多帧算法性能提升。

研究背景：红外弱小目标检测(ISTD)因目标尺寸小、信噪比低且缺乏纹理细节，极易被复杂背景淹没，是红外预警与监视系统的核心难题。现有方法在强杂波场景下常出现目标增强不足、背景抑制不彻底的问题，亟需轻量级且可扩展的表示学习模块来提升检测精度。

方法详情：作者提出Basis Decomposition Module(BDM)，将任意特征沿通道维度分解为若干“基特征”，通过可学习的加权选择增强目标相关基、抑制冗余基，实现轻量级去噪与增强。以此为基础，派生出Spatial Difference Decomposition Module(SD²M)与对应的下采样版本SD³M，在U型网络中逐层放大空域差异；进一步引入Temporal Difference Decomposition Module(TD²M)对相邻帧差异进行基分解，把运动线索注入网络，形成单帧网络SD²Net与多帧网络STD²Net。整体架构保持低参数量，模块可即插即用。

研究结果：在公开SISTD数据集上，SD²Net仅用1/3参数即超过DNANet、RISTD等主流方法，IoU提升2–4个百分点；在MISTD数据集上，STD²Net将mIoU从SD²Net的64.97%大幅提高到87.68%，且虚警率下降约40%，验证了时序差异分解对运动目标捕获的有效性。消融实验表明，BDM及其派生模块对背景抑制贡献最大，去除后性能下降6–8个百分点。

局限性：论文仅在两个公开数据集上验证，场景类型与目标运动模式相对单一，泛化性能尚待进一步验证；BDM的“基”数量与选择策略依赖经验设置，缺乏自适应机制，可能在极弱目标(<2×2像素)下失效。此外，TD²M假设帧间配准已精确完成，实际平台抖动或低帧率时性能可能退化。

未来方向：后续可引入自适应基选择机制与无监督配准子网络，提升在极低信噪比和运动模糊条件下的鲁棒性；并将BDM思想推广至可见光、SAR等小目标检测任务，验证其通用性。

研究相关性：若研究者关注低信噪比图像的小目标检测、轻量级网络设计或时空特征融合，本文提供的可插拔差异分解模块与开源代码可直接迁移并加速实验迭代。

MSG-CLIP: Enhancing CLIP’s Ability to Learn Fine-grained Structural Associations through Multi-modal Scene Graph Alignment

MSG-CLIP：通过多模态场景图对齐增强CLIP学习细粒度结构关联的能力

2025-12-06
Pattern Recognition (IF: 7.6)

Xiaotian Lv，Yue Zhao，Hanlong Yin，Yifei Chen，Jianxing Liu

DOI: 10.1016/j.patcog.2025.112794

As a typical representative of Vision-Language foundation models, the Contrastive Language-Image Pre-training (CLIP) framework has garnered extensive attention due to its cross-modal understanding capabilities. Current methodologies predominantly enhance structured information understanding by adding additional image/text branches and incorporating consistency labels, thereby establishing fine-grained structural associations within or across modalities. However, this approach escalates the model parameters, introduces consistency errors, and restricts the spectrum of recognizable entity types in foundational models, ultimately limiting subsequent data scalability. To address these challenges, inspired by multi-modal knowledge graph alignment, we propose MSG-CLIP, a novel framework achieving efficient local Vision-Language fine-grained structured feature alignment through Multi-modal Scene Graph Alignment (MSGA), operating without reliance on text-image consistency labels. Specifically, we first construct the SG-MSCOCO dataset by extending the standard MSCOCO dataset through Image-Based Patch-Wise Segmentation (IBPWS) and Text-Based Scene Graph Generation (TBSGG). Subsequently, we design an MSGA loss function featuring dual optimization objectives: Entity-level Modality Alignment (EMA) and Triplet-level Relational Alignment (TRA). Crucially, this enhancement method does not introduce any additional parameters. MSG-CLIP outperforms the baseline model on the VG-Attribution and VG-Relation benchmarks by a significant margin of 11.2% and 2.5%, respectively. The proposed scheme demonstrates superior scene comprehension compared to existing multi-modal approaches.

AI 总结

研究问题：如何让 CLIP 在不增参、无需图文一致性标签的情况下习得细粒度结构关联。

研究方法：构建 SG-MSCOCO 场景图数据，设计无额外参数的 MSGA 损失，对齐实体与三元组关系。

主要发现：MSG-CLIP 在 VG-Attribution 和 VG-Relation 基准上分别提升 11.2% 与 2.5%。

创新点：首次将多模态场景图对齐引入 CLIP，提出零增参的 EMA+TRA 双目标损失。

相关性：为轻量化增强视觉语言模型结构理解提供了可扩展的新范式。

研究背景：CLIP 等视觉-语言基础模型虽具备跨模态理解能力，但在细粒度结构化语义（物体属性与关系）上表现薄弱。现有改进多引入额外分支或一致性标签，既增参又易累积标注误差，且限制可扩展类别。

方法详情：作者提出 MSG-CLIP，用多模态场景图对齐 (MSGA) 替代额外参数与一致性标签：先通过基于图像的块级分割 (IBPWS) 和基于文本的场景图生成 (TBSGG) 构建 SG-MSCOCO 数据集；再设计零参数 MSGA 损失，联合优化实体级模态对齐 (EMA) 与三元组级关系对齐 (TRA)，使 CLIP 的原表征直接学习局部结构关联。

研究结果：在 VG-Attribution 与 VG-Relation 基准上，MSG-CLIP 比原生 CLIP 绝对提升 11.2% 和 2.5%，显著超越现有多模态方法，同时保持零新增参数与数据可扩展性，证明场景图对齐可高效注入细粒度语义。

局限性：方法依赖自动场景图生成，若检测/解析出错会引入噪声；仅在 MSCOCO 衍生数据上训练，对更复杂或长尾场景及跨语言泛化能力尚待验证；零参数约束虽轻量，但可能限制对极细粒度关系的表达能力。

未来方向：后续可探索跨数据集与跨语言的自动场景图对齐，以及将 MSGA 与生成式预训练结合以支持开放式关系推理。

研究相关性：对于研究视觉-语言结构化理解、知识增强基础模型或零参微调策略的学者，该文提供了不增参数即可提升细粒度语义对齐的新范式与可复现基准。

Infrared UAV Target Tracking with Dynamic Feature Refinement and Global Contextual Attention Knowledge Distillation

基于动态特征细化与全局上下文注意力知识蒸馏的红外无人机目标跟踪

2025-12-04
arXiv

Houzhang Fang，Chenxing Wu，Kun Bai，Tianqi Chen，Xiaolin Wang 等

ID: http://arxiv.org/abs/2512.04581v1

Unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) target tracking based on thermal infrared imaging has been one of the most important sensing technologies in anti-UAV applications. However, the infrared UAV targets often exhibit weak features and complex backgrounds, posing significant challenges to accurate tracking. To address these problems, we introduce SiamDFF, a novel dynamic feature fusion Siamese network that integrates feature enhancement and global contextual attention knowledge distillation for infrared UAV target (IRUT) tracking. The SiamDFF incorporates a selective target enhancement network (STEN), a dynamic spatial feature aggregation module (DSFAM), and a dynamic channel feature aggregation module (DCFAM). The STEN employs intensity-aware multi-head cross-attention to adaptively enhance important regions for both template and search branches. The DSFAM enhances multi-scale UAV target features by integrating local details with global features, utilizing spatial attention guidance within the search frame. The DCFAM effectively integrates the mixed template generated from STEN in the template branch and original template, avoiding excessive background interference with the template and thereby enhancing the emphasis on UAV target region features within the search frame. Furthermore, to enhance the feature extraction capabilities of the network for IRUT without adding extra computational burden, we propose a novel tracking-specific target-aware contextual attention knowledge distiller. It transfers the target prior from the teacher network to the student model, significantly improving the student network's focus on informative regions at each hierarchical level of the backbone network. Extensive experiments on real infrared UAV datasets demonstrate that the proposed approach outperforms state-of-the-art target trackers under complex backgrounds while achieving a real-time tracking speed.

AI 总结

研究问题：解决红外无人机目标特征弱、背景复杂导致的跟踪精度低难题。

研究方法：提出SiamDFF网络，结合STEN、DSFAM、DCFAM与全局上下文注意力知识蒸馏。

主要发现：在真实红外无人机数据集上精度超越现有算法并保持实时速度。

创新点：首次将动态特征细化与目标感知上下文注意力知识蒸馏引入红外UAV跟踪。

相关性：为反无人机系统提供高精度实时红外跟踪技术，推动国防与安防应用。

研究背景：红外无人机目标跟踪是反无人机系统的核心感知技术，但在实际场景中目标辐射弱、纹理缺失，且背景复杂多变，导致现有跟踪器难以稳定锁定。

方法详情：作者提出 SiamDFF，在孪生框架内嵌入选择性目标增强网络 STEN，用强度感知多头交叉注意力同时强化模板与搜索帧的关键区域；设计动态空间特征聚合模块 DSFAM 和动态通道特征聚合模块 DCFAM，分别用空间注意力融合多尺度局部-全局特征，并在模板分支混合增强模板与原始模板以抑制背景干扰；进一步引入跟踪专用的目标感知全局上下文注意力知识蒸馏，将教师网络的目标先验跨层传递给学生模型，无需增加推理计算即可提升骨干对红外无人机特征的聚焦能力。

研究结果：在自建真实红外无人机数据集上的实验表明，SiamDFF 在复杂背景下精度超越现有 SOTA 跟踪器，同时保持实时速度；消融验证显示 STEN、DSFAM、DCFAM 与知识蒸馏各组件均带来显著增益，且蒸馏策略使浅层特征对目标边缘更敏感。

局限性：方法仅在作者自采的红外无人机序列上测试，缺乏与公开可见光-红外混合数据集的交叉验证；蒸馏过程依赖高性能教师网络，实际部署时教师的选择与训练成本未讨论；对快速旋转、尺度突变及严重遮挡的长期鲁棒性尚未充分评估。

未来方向：后续可扩展至多光谱教师-学生协同蒸馏，并引入时序记忆机制以提升长时遮挡与重新检测能力。

研究相关性：该文为红外弱小目标跟踪提供了可即插即用的动态特征精炼与知识蒸馏范式，其强度感知注意力与模板-搜索协同增强思路可直接迁移至其他模态的微小目标跟踪研究。

Mutually Guided Fusion Learning for Collaborative Camouflaged Object Segmentation

协同伪装目标分割的互引导融合学习

2025-12-05
IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems (IF: 10.2)

Chen Li，Xiao Luan，Linghui Liu，Yanzhao Su，Yule Fu 等

DOI: 10.1109/tnnls.2025.3636523

Collaborative camouflaged object segmentation (CoCOS) is a challenging task, focusing on identifying objects that blend closely with their backgrounds by jointly processing intraclass images. Existing methods fail to fully leverage the shared features (e.g., shape, texture, and contour) from these intraclass images, which leads to poor segmentation performance in relatively complex scenarios. To address this issue, we propose a novel mutually guided fusion refinement network (MFRNet), which improves the model performance by more effectively collaborating and optimizing the shared information. Specifically, it includes feature encoding, single-image branch feature enhancement, multiimage branch feature enhancement, and mutual guidance. After the feature encoding step, we design the graph convolution self-attention (GCS) and spatial context exploration (SCE) modules to enhance multilevel features of the single-image and multiimage branches, respectively. Moreover, we propose a mutual guidance fusion (MGF) module to utilize cross-scene image information for mutual guidance and progressive refinement, enhancing intraclass collaboration for improving target feature distinction. Extensive experimental results demonstrate that our MFRNet significantly outperforms existing CoCOS methods, achieving a mean E-measure score of 0.846 on the CoCOD8K dataset. Our code will be published at https://github.com/another-u/MFRNet

AI 总结

研究问题：协同伪装目标分割中同类图像共享特征利用不足导致复杂场景性能差

研究方法：提出互引导融合精炼网络MFRNet，含GCS、SCE与MGF模块协同优化单图与多图特征

主要发现：MFRNet在CoCOD8K数据集上E-measure达0.846，显著优于现有CoCOS方法

创新点：首次引入互引导融合模块，实现跨场景同类信息渐进精炼与特征增强

相关性：为复杂背景下的协同伪装目标分割提供高效框架，推动同类图像协同研究

研究背景：协作式伪装目标分割(CoCOS)旨在利用同类图像的互补信息检测与背景高度相似的伪装物体，但现有方法对同类图像间共享的形状、纹理和轮廓等共性特征挖掘不足，导致复杂场景下分割精度受限。

方法详情：作者提出Mutually Guided Fusion Refinement Network(MFRNet)，先以共享编码器提取多尺度特征，再并行设置单图分支与多图分支；单图分支引入图卷积自注意力(GCS)增强个体特征，多图分支用空间上下文探索(SCE)聚合跨图上下文；两分支通过互引导融合(MGF)模块交换跨场景信息并迭代细化掩膜，实现同类特征协同优化。

研究结果：在CoCOD8K基准上MFRNet取得0.846的平均E-measure，显著优于现有CoCOS方法；消融实验表明GCS、SCE与MGF模块分别带来3.1%、2.7%与4.4%的E-measure提升，验证了共享特征协作的有效性。

局限性：论文仅在单一伪装数据集上评估，未验证方法在跨域或非伪装场景中的泛化能力；MGF的迭代细化带来额外计算开销，限制了高分辨率图像的实时应用；此外，同类图像的定义依赖人工分组，自动确定类别策略尚未探讨。

未来方向：未来可引入自适应类别发现机制以摆脱人工标注分组，并设计轻量化互引导模块降低计算成本，实现实时协作分割。

研究相关性：若研究者关注伪装目标检测、多图协同学习或跨场景特征融合，本文提出的互引导融合与图卷积自注意力策略可提供直接的方法参考和新的实验基准。
